story:
Two Faces of a Patriot

Two of the best science fiction “what if” stories ever written are Aldous Huxley’s Brave New World and George Orwell’s 1984.

In Brave New World people are controlled by pleasure. In 1984 they are controlled by pain.

Perhaps it is something else.

Two Faces of a Patriot is a compelling science fiction novel for our time. This powerful “what if” tale combines adventure, new tech and politics to keep you entertained and turning pages into the night as it presents an impending course of events, created by serious wrongdoings in the past, that must be averted at all cost.

The main storyline is set primarily in the near-future, at a time when paranoia, control and power have changed virtually everything in American society, where social engineering has severely limited nearly every personal freedom.

Welcome to 2025 and beyond.

All U.S. citizens carry biometric ID cards with retinal scans and photographs. A.I. monitors people’s daily moods, reactions and activities. Roughly half of all high school students are labeled with one or more mental disorders, managed by mind-bending drugs and tracked with chip implants. By law, all books must be digital, allowing DHS to identify potential terrorists.

With all that has changed, by 2035, tensions have risen dramatically.

Sides have been taken. Lines have been drawn.

Join Jonathon, Ashley and a host of other characters, some you will love and some you will hate, in a captivating and daring tale of right and wrong, good and evil.

Coming May 25, 2020  

From Chapter One

When Ashley Lawford bolted through the screening portal at the entrance to Barack Obama High School, red strobe lights flared and a security alarm erupted into an ear-splitting alert.

It was so shrill that Jonathon Carr, who had entered right in front of her, dropped to one knee, threw his hands over his ears, and squeezed his eyes shut as if blocking his sight would turn the screeching off. 

Ashley remained standing, but was also covering her ears when the team of flak-jacketed DAA agents, guns drawn, faces hidden behind black-visored helmets, charged at her screaming, “On the floor! Get on the floor. Face down. Now! Now! Now!”

Ashley turned toward the men. “I just forgot—” was all she managed to get out before she was tased, crumpled to the floor, and started flopping around in the hallway like a freshly caught tuna.

What Help is needed and what you receive:

Two Faces of a Patriot is being self-published and will be available on our website as a quality or trade paperback book, the same size as a hardcover book but with a soft cover.

To help meet the cost of everything involved in self-publishing Two Faces of a Patriot in trade paperback format (size 6"x9" with a soft-cover) and a limited number of hardcover editions with four-color dust jackets, there are pre-order tiers established allowing you to secure your copy early, to be shipped the day of release…May 25, 2020. Possibly a bit earlier :-)

There are only 200 hardcover editions being published and up to 150 of these are being offered here to our Indiegogo supporters.

The money raised in this campaign will ultimately cover all of the various editing costs, the book cover design and copy for the hardcover and trade paperback editions, layout and formatting of the book, printing of the trade paperback and hardcover editions, some initial marketing, as well as fulfillment and shipping of perks, credit card processing and Indiegogo fees.

Make sure that you secure your copy of Two Faces of a Patriot, a compelling novel for our time, by selecting your Perk today.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest hurdle or challenge has been to complete the actual writing (and what seemed like constant rewriting) and that is done. All of the people and companies needed to transform the manuscript into an actual book have been lined up. At this point the only major risk is in not making the publishing date of May 25. However, reaching or exceeding our flexible goal will eliminate that risk and ensure that all backers of this campaign receive their copy in the timeframe stated.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you have family and friends who you feel would like to read Two Faces of a Patriot, please let them know about our campaign so that they, too, can pre-order their copy. You can use the share tools offered by Indiegogo to share the campaign on Social Media or even send emails with a link to this page. Thank you!
story_txt:
Two Faces of a Patriot
Two of the best science fiction “what if” stories ever written are Aldous Huxley’s Brave New World and George Orwell’s 1984.
In Brave New World people are controlled by pleasure. In 1984 they are controlled by pain.
Perhaps it is something else.
Two Faces of a Patriot is a compelling science fiction novel for our time. This powerful “what if” tale combines adventure, new tech and politics to keep you entertained and turning pages into the night as it presents an impending course of events, created by serious wrongdoings in the past, that must be averted at all cost.
The main storyline is set primarily in the near-future, at a time when paranoia, control and power have changed virtually everything in American society, where social engineering has severely limited nearly every personal freedom.
Welcome to 2025 and beyond.
All U.S. citizens carry biometric ID cards with retinal scans and photographs. A.I. monitors people’s daily moods, reactions and activities. Roughly half of all high school students are labeled with one or more mental disorders, managed by mind-bending drugs and tracked with chip implants. By law, all books must be digital, allowing DHS to identify potential terrorists.
With all that has changed, by 2035, tensions have risen dramatically.
Sides have been taken. Lines have been drawn.
Join Jonathon, Ashley and a host of other characters, some you will love and some you will hate, in a captivating and daring tale of right and wrong, good and evil.
Coming May 25, 2020  
From Chapter One
When Ashley Lawford bolted through the screening portal at the entrance to Barack Obama High School, red strobe lights flared and a security alarm erupted into an ear-splitting alert.
It was so shrill that Jonathon Carr, who had entered right in front of her, dropped to one knee, threw his hands over his ears, and squeezed his eyes shut as if blocking his sight would turn the screeching off. 
Ashley remained standing, but was also covering her ears when the team of flak-jacketed DAA agents, guns drawn, faces hidden behind black-visored helmets, charged at her screaming, “On the floor! Get on the floor. Face down. Now! Now! Now!”
Ashley turned toward the men. “I just forgot—” was all she managed to get out before she was tased, crumpled to the floor, and started flopping around in the hallway like a freshly caught tuna.

What Help is needed and what you receive:
Two Faces of a Patriot is being self-published and will be available on our website as a quality or trade paperback book, the same size as a hardcover book but with a soft cover.
To help meet the cost of everything involved in self-publishing Two Faces of a Patriot in trade paperback format (size 6"x9" with a soft-cover) and a limited number of hardcover editions with four-color dust jackets, there are pre-order tiers established allowing you to secure your copy early, to be shipped the day of release…May 25, 2020. Possibly a bit earlier :-)
There are only 200 hardcover editions being published and up to 150 of these are being offered here to our Indiegogo supporters.
The money raised in this campaign will ultimately cover all of the various editing costs, the book cover design and copy for the hardcover and trade paperback editions, layout and formatting of the book, printing of the trade paperback and hardcover editions, some initial marketing, as well as fulfillment and shipping of perks, credit card processing and Indiegogo fees.
Make sure that you secure your copy of Two Faces of a Patriot, a compelling novel for our time, by selecting your Perk today.
Risks & Challenges
The biggest hurdle or challenge has been to complete the actual writing (and what seemed like constant rewriting) and that is done. All of the people and companies needed to transform the manuscript into an actual book have been lined up. At this point the only major risk is in not making the publishing date of May 25. However, reaching or exceeding our flexible goal will eliminate that risk and ensure that all backers of this campaign receive their copy in the timeframe stated.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you have family and friends who you feel would like to read Two Faces of a Patriot, please let them know about our campaign so that they, too, can pre-order their copy. You can use the share tools offered by Indiegogo to share the campaign on Social Media or even send emails with a link to this page. Thank you!

story:
Siamo molto orgogliosi di avere la possibilità di curare l’edizione italiana del bel libro “Passagen” di Johannes Odenthal sul danzatore e coreografo Koffi Kôkô, uscito finora SOLO in lingua tedesca.

Chi siamo?

Fontana Editore è una casa editrice che pubblica saggi, manuali, testi di esoterismo, alchimia, spiritualità, zen, scienza, meditazione, consapevolezza, numerologia, yoga, arte.

Il nostro motto è: “Migliorando noi stessi, influenziamo per risonanza anche il nostro ambiente quotidiano, le persone a noi vicine e di conseguenza MIGLIORIAMO IL MONDO.”

Da più parti siamo stati sollecitati ad intraprendere quest’impresa: la traduzione del libro “Passagen” di Johannes Odenthal, perché tanti sono i fans e gli allievi italiani di questo straordinario maestro di danza.

Questa è la seconda campagna di crowdfundig al progetto, in quanto la precedente si è svolta in concomitanza delle festività natalizie e ci sono pervenute molte segnalazioni di persone che in quel periodo erano impegnate e non sono riuscite a contribuire in tempo.
 

Cosa vi proponiano?

Koffi Kôkô ballerino e coreografo, vive tra il Benin e la Francia. Dagli Anni '80 è uno dei protagonisti dello sviluppo della scena contemporanea della danza africana. Il suo lavoro comprende circa 40 coreografie, una sua teoria del movimento e numerose collaborazioni con artisti come Yoshi Oida, Wole Soyinka, Susanne Linke, William Kentridge e Mari Carmen García.

Ha sviluppato un'opera unica che traduce la filosofia del Voodoo e il potenziale del suo rituale per il palcoscenico della danza occidentale, proponendolo in una lingua teatrale internazionale.

Attraverso interviste, saggi, voci di diario e lezioni, emerge una descrizione della danza di Koffi Kôkô come mezzo di conoscenza e come linguaggio artistico che trasforma l'eredità del colonialismo e della schiavitù in rituali e coreografie potenti e trasformative.

Nel 2015, Koffi Kôkô ha tenuto la Valeska Gert Visiting Professor presso la FU Berlin. 2016 e nel 2017 è stato membro del Research College Interweaving Performance Cultures.

 


I costi di realizzazione di una traduzione non sono pochi e una piccola casa editrice deve essere un po matta e coraggiosa per lanciarsi in un’impresa del genere. Per questo chiediamo il vostro aiuto e sostegno, attraverso l’acquisto in prevendita del libro nella nostra prossima edizione in lingua italiana. Tra l’altro la nostra edizione, in lingua italiana, sarà molto più bella dell’originale, con nuove immagini forniteci direttamente da Koffi Kôkô e una nuova impaginazione estremamente curata (siamo molto pignoli a riguardo).

 

Riepilogo dei costi:

I costi sono principalmente per la traduzione dell’intero testo, che si aggira intorno ai 3,000 + iva. A seguire i costi di stampa e spedizione per le prime 300 copie del libro per circa 2,000 euro.

Il costo del libro è quello di vendita e sono comprese anche le spese di spedizione, perciò il libro è molto più conveniente delle copie che successivamente saranno messe in commercio.

A quanti vorranno contribuire all’impresa verranno inviate informazioni periodiche e dettagliate sull’avanzamento dei lavori e sulle date di consegna delle proprie copie del libro.

La consegna del libro è stimata in circa 3 mesi dalla chiusura di questa campagna di crowdfunding. Il tempo necessario per fare l’accurata traduzione, la nuova impaginazione e la messa in stampa.
 

Perché questo progetto è prezioso?

Un’edizione italiana del libro “Passagen” di Johannes Odenthal porta finalmente, anche al pubblico italiano, la possibilità di approfondire la conoscenza di Koffi Kôkô e dei suoi metodi e la sua filosofia di danza. Il suo approccio è unico e attinge, come detto precedentemente, ad ancestrali e profonde tradizioni africane, precisamente quelle dalla tradizione Voodoo. Una conoscenza e un lavoro sul corpo straordinario e quanto mai utile e necessario, di integrazione dell’essere, soprattutto nella nostra società occidentale così arroccata e sbilanciata sull’aspetto “mentale”.

 

Altri modi in cui puoi aiutare

Alcune persone semplicemente non possono contribuire, ma ciò non significa che non possano aiutare:

  1. Anche se deciderai di non contribuire alla campagna, il tuo aiuto ci è prezioso per farla conoscere ad altri.
  2. Aiutaci condividendo questa pagina sui tuoi social o segnalandola ad amici che possano essere interessati.
  3. Aiutaci a fare tanto rumore, tanto quanto il battito dei tamburi africani in festa.
  4. Più sopra troverai tutti gli strumenti social per le tue condivisioni.

 

Vogliamo ringraziare l’associazione ATOUT AFRICAN ARCH.IT per il sostegno e l’intermediazione diretta con il maestro Koffi Kôkô. Vai al sito web >>

story:
Story of My Book

 

Living with a mental health disorder is often associated with the idea of being “insane”, "crazy", "troubled", and anything and everything that suggests a peripheral divide between the norms of human nature. Such beliefs have, on occasion, led individuals struggling with their mental health to view themselves in the same light—as tarnished, crazy, and broken.

In Musings of a Broken Mind: A Collection of Poems and Prose, you will read about lived experiences and reflections from the perspective of a broken woman living in an equally broken world. The book follows the author’s journey from childhood, to leaving home at sixteen, to being adopted by a new family. It includes emails sent to her therapist, a romantic relationship, and her struggles with OCD and C-PTSD. 

Musings of a Broken Mind gives the reader deeper insight into the factors that play a role in the formation of an individual’s life and identity. Some factors include culture, religion, trauma, family, environment, socioeconomic status, education, the unconscious, and more. Suleman believes that before any labels, disorders, and illnesses, we are humans—complex in our many facets that shape who we are and who we will become.
 

The Book - Musings Of A Broken Mind

 

In Musings Of A Broken Mind you'll learn about the nuances of mental health and the impacts it has on parts of the narrator's life, including within friendships, family, clash of two different cultures, romance, schooling, and more. Some stories from my book include:

“Broken” a poem regarding the word "broken".

“Better Times,“ where I share stories about the relationship between my biological family and then my later adoptive family.

“Anxiety,'” in which I explore my thoughts and feelings surrounding my OCD.

You will love this book if you’re interested in understanding what the world looks like to someone who is living with comorbid mental health diagnoses.

 

What I Need & What You Get

 

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July 2020.

The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer.

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)

Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback

The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover

I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more...

 

About the Author

 

Bisma Suleman studied psychology and creative writing at Duke University. Despite the obstacles she has faced in her life—whether it be leaving home at sixteen, navigating mental health struggles, or early childhood trauma—her experiences have shaped her into the strong woman she is today. Bisma recognizes the importance of sharing her story in the hope that others will know they are not alone in their own battles. When she is not writing or researching, she enjoys telling bad puns and using laughter as her greatest coping mechanism.

For more information, you can connect with Bisma at her email address bbs22@duke.edu or @bisma.suleman on Instagram.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via IndieGoGo at the top of the page!

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!


With gratitude,
Bisma Suleman

story:
Evolution of A Wild Heart

Book Launch

Stories of how I paid my therapists in nuts...

Evolution of a Wild Heart is a book for anyone seeking serenity in these troubled times. It's an inspiring guide to finding joy and hope in the world around us, and to falling back in love with life and ourselves.

More About this book:

One of modern America’s gifted wildlife artists, JoAnne Helfert Sullam has created fine oil/acrylic paintings of animals and landscapes that have been featured in the New York Times and have received special Congressional recognition. But her beautiful images actually only hint at the full depth of her deep connection to nature.

    Now, in her candid and compelling memoir, Evolution of a Wild Heart, JoAnne reveals how a lifetime of observing and caring for birds, deer, a racoon, wolf and other creatures has brought her closer to not only the natural world but also her true self. She also offers readers ways they, too, can let nature spark a powerful inner transformation.

    Little about JoAnne’s childhood suggested her future as an accomplished artist and naturalist. Growing up in an impoverished Brooklyn neighborhood, she didn’t have easy access to nature. She struggled with a learning disability in school and was unfairly stigmatized —a “misfit” status she eagerly embraced for a time.

    But encounter after encounter with unforgettable animals gradually led her to discover her life’s purpose and the peace she’d found so elusive. JoAnne introduces readers to some of her most important animal guides: the lowly caterpillar on a tomato leaf who gave her a glimpse of her inner beauty… the laughing squirrel who taught her about letting go… the wild loon whose unexpected nap on her at the beach helped her experience new levels of calm, trust… and more.

 

 

 

 

 

As readers follow JoAnne on her journey from negative thinking and emotional turmoil to tranquility and self-assurance,

they’ll discover how the wisdom she’s gleaned from painting and conserving the animal kingdom can lead them to create the best possible versions of themselves.

I seek to raise enough money to facilitate the editing, printing, mass production and distribution processes. The goal is to reach, empower, educate and encourage people. 

Help me make this book a reality. Thank you for your support! 

Please share this page with your animal-book loving friends!!

story:
'The Soul Letter You Never Received'

'Letters From The Wound', coming out this fall - Vol I
'Your Healing Balm Is Waiting For You', aiming for spring - Vol II
'Show Up, Your Scars Are Beautiful', later in 2020 - Vol III

Originally from France, I now live in York, England. I love to express myself equally in both languages and tend to allow what needs to be shared to come out in whatever language and medium it chooses to. I write, compose, sing, take photos, make videos for my songs, work with shamanic drums, shruti boxes, singing bowls... Basically, I spend a lot of time observing and trying to capture the beauty that life offers us each day, in any way I can. Our inner world fascinates me as much as the world around us and I find the mysteries we cannot grasp with our eyes beyond exciting! 

I have always written, mostly to myself, but also to others. One of my favourite things is to sit in a cafe and write letters, while drinking coffee. I do not do that nearly as much as I should nowadays. These books are a way for me to share what is in my heart and what my soul can no longer keep to herself; letters - but in a different format, more like thoughts, reflections, prayers. 

An invitation for you to reclaim all that you are, to feel alive and to connect to life's magic.

Here are a couple extracts from 'Letters From The Wound':

☾

"The flame 

Bends 

Towards 

Where 

You 

Used to 

Sit."

 

"Unplug 

From those multiple extensions, 

And go back 

To source."

❧

I guess you could say that they are poetic prose or perhaps mystic, spiritual, philosophical poetry. They came as snippets of inspiration, little reminders, testimonies of feelings and gentle callings back to source.

These books are a journey home, a dance with darkness and light, an embrace of grief and loss, an invitation to feel all that is and to rise stronger and freer than ever before. From the wound to the arena of your life - whatever that may be for you. No more hiding, no more shrinking. It is my hope and wish that these books resonate with you and remind you of how beautiful, unique and worthy you are and that it is vital that you do not abandon yourself.

I would love you to be part of this journey.

In order for these books to reach you and possibly become a companion to others, I need your help and support to raise funds to self-publish (proof reading, formatting, etc...) and promote them. 

The target I set will cover the publication of the 3 volumes - which if met, would be beyond terrific. I am absolutely determined to get these books published and out into the world, so I am on mission here!!! Please join me.

I am deeply grateful for any contribution you can make and I have come up with a selection of yummy treats for you, which I hope you will find exciting, fun and helpful too: from a signed copy of the book, of course, to cards with quotes from the 3 books; from the opportunity to work one to one with me, to a personalised song or video; from a house concert/book reading, to booking me for a group singing session or sacred voice, sound and drum circle.

If you are touched by this but cannot afford to chip in, please know that you can still make a big difference by telling as many people as you can about this campaign, by sharing on social media, by sending me encouraging messages ;o)

With much love and gratitude, Natacha

I love to express myself equally in both languages and tend to allow what needs to be shared to come out in whatever language and medium it chooses to. I write, compose, sing, take photos, make videos for my songs, work with shamanic drums, shruti boxes, singing bowls... Basically, I spend a lot of time observing and trying to capture the beauty that life offers us each day, in any way I can. Our inner world fascinates me as much as the world around us and I find the mysteries we cannot grasp with our eyes beyond exciting! I have always written, mostly to myself, but also to others. story:
ABCville - The Beginning

When Karen's children were little, they often made handmade books together about things happening in their lives and in their community.  With Karen's background teaching young children, she developed a love for sharing beautiful picture books with a younger generation. Karen began dreaming about creating a book like this about her community, Charlottesville, Virginia.  

ABCville - The Middle

That's when Karen reached out to her friend, Cary, a Charlottesville artist and photographer and they got to work. By combining their skills, Karen and Cary were able to visualize this project together. They headed out into the community to photograph 26 different spots around Charlottesville. They considered each letter carefully so that the book will engage young children.  They then spent over a year researching different publishing options for ABCville, and realized that self-publishing their local book would be the best fit.  They are ready to publish their first round of hardcover alphabet books by this fall.

ABCville - The End (but really the beginning)

This is where THEY need YOU! 

In order to publish their first round of books, Karen and Cary will need:

  • $6,915.90 - Publishing of 1,000 books (the most cost effective)
  • $500 - Professional design and editing
  • $350 - 2 sample books
  • $204 - shipping of books
  • $50 - ISBN #

 

Since their book celebrates Charlottesville, they are reaching out for support from their local community! Karen and Cary hope that the community will recognize and share the value of a book like ABCville. 

There will be a simple map of Charlottesville in the back of the book to help locate the places and objects represented in the book. Young children love to explore their environment and often notice details that adults may miss. ABCville is a way for them to explore our hometown. Some places will be very familiar to children and others will be a new discovery.  Karen and Cary's goal is to help children get excited as they make connections by exploring their community through ABCville!

If the total funding is secured by the end of this campaign, Karen and Cary will send the book off to the publisher for printing. The actual printing process will take 6-8 weeks.  Their anticipated date for having books in hand is sometime in early November.  

They will plan to send regular updates on the campaign progress and keep people informed on any changes on ship dates for all perks.   

Risks & Challenges

If they don't meet their funding goal with this campaign, the publishing schedule for ABCville will be delayed. However, they would plan to apply for a small business loan. As Karen and Cary are both Community Investment Collaborative (CIC) graduates, they would have access to several loan options. In this case, the estimated date for having books in hand would be sometime in early 2020. 

If you are interested in helping them with this project, but do not want to receive a book or a perk, you can always:

  • Help them get the word out by using the Indiegogo share tools
  • Let friends and family know about the book and campaign
  • Simply make a donation (email us at abcvillebook@gmail.com)

 

And that's all there is to it!

story:
Short Summary

Lon Michaels is a father, husband, singer/songwriter and author of “The Jesus Dilemma”. Lon is 51 years old and lives in up-state New York with his family. Lon has five children and has spent most of his life as a believer of Father God. Lon attended parochial school as a child and was already challenging the teachers of his Missouri Synod church by age twelve. Lon has always had issues with organized religion, as many people do.

This IndieGoGo campaign is about support, not money. I only need a small amount of money to realize the goal of getting “The Jesus Dilemma” into printed format. I am hoping that this campaign will raise awareness of the validity of a book like this. The book is intended to make people think, as my video says. If wide is the road that leads to destruction and narrow the path that leads to righteousness, how can so many non-bible reading Christians all be right?

By lending your support, I expect that you will read all or most of the final draft PDF, and spread the word about “The Jesus Dilemma”. I hope to inspire as many people as possible with this book. I am not about selling millions of copies, but that would be nice. I am not in this for money, although that would be nice too. I am in this because it has been a work in progress for over 15 years in the making and I feel that I have been led and inspired to take this to the finish line. The goal is $2,000.00. With as little of a contribution of ten dollars to be among the first to read it. I hope you will give your support.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The goal is $2,000.00. It will be used to purchase services from Matchstick Literary (https://www.matchliterary.com/). These services include the following;  

PACKAGE

PROMO

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

Soft Cover Availability

√

 

eBook Availability

√

 

COVER

 

 

Cover Art Design Service

Advanced

 

Cover Image

10

 

Cover Text & Layout

√

 

Author Supplied Cover

√

 

Author Photo and Profile

√

 

Personalized Back Cover

√

 

Back Cover Copywriting

√

 

Cover Design Correction

Advanced

 

INTERIOR

 

 

Trim Size

√

 

Interior Design and Layout Service

Advanced

 

B&W Image Insertion

20

 

Interior Graphics and Tables

√

 

Interior Design Service Correction

√

 

EDITING

 

 

Content Evaluation

√

 

Copy-Editing(minimum of 50,000 words)

Add-on

 

GALLEY PROOFS

 

 

Electronic Gallery

√

 

REGISTRATIONS

 

 

ISBN (for Book and eBook)

√

 

Library of Congress Registration

√

 

U.S. Copyright Registration

√

 

DISTRIBUTION

 

 

Worldwide Online Book Distribution

√

 

Amazon Look Inside*

√

 

Ingram Listing

√

 

Barnes & Noble “Read Instantly” Feature*

√

 

COMPLIMENTARY COPIES

 

 

Soft cover Author Copy

1 Copy

 

 

 

POST FULFILLMENT

 

 

Sales and Royalty Portal

100%

 

One-on-One Support

√

 

Non-exclusive Contract

√

 

MARKETING

 

 

Email Marketing Campaign

√

 
   

 
   

 

Book video trailer posted in YouTube and other social media site

√
   
   

 

 
   
   
       
I have researched this company extensively, and trust that they will do an exceptional job. I have contacted other businesses that they interact with and they are legitimate.
 
 
 

There are only three perks for this campaign. I am trying to keep it as simple as possible.

$10.00 – PDF copy of the final draft, before going to print.

$25.00 – PDF copy and e-book, as soon as registered and available.

$50.00 – PDF copy, e-book and signed copy of the paper back.

 

I am excited about these perks and hope you find them attractive to lend your support.

If the goal is not reached, I will use the funding for plan B and self-publish to Amazon.com at the tier that the funds allow. I really believe that people will fund this campaign and I plan to move forward. If the goal is reached in excess I will use the funds for additional marketing efforts.

The Impact

Every contribution is valued. I want you to feel that you are important to me, and you are. I don’t know the full impact that this book will cause. I expect that some readers will not like it, and others will. I believe in whatever capacity this book is received is up to the will of the man in charge.

This is the second version of this story. Another book was written in 2006 and published with another self-publishing company that will remain unnamed. I am very unhappy with the results of that book. But this is a better story and I believe what is meant to be is meant to be.

I really hope that you are moved to support this book. It would mean a lot to me and I am open to comments and suggestions once we have contact with each other.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If after watching the video, and reading up till now, you are unwilling to give me your support, I ask you to do this; spread the word to those you know that may be interested.

CHAPTER 1

 

Father John Martin was stunned. His eyes watered, his legs buckled. He was in awe at what he had just read. He could not believe or comprehend the knowledge that had finally been given to him.  

       John was not sure what happened next. He was not sure if he fainted or collapsed. All he knew was that suddenly he was lying on the floor of the most sacred and secret room in the Vatican’s archives. He also knew that in his sudden state, his bladder functions had given out and that he had urinated all over the floor and himself.

       The tears in his eyes and on his face were like acid. They both burned and tasted like he was licking a battery. John prayed another prayer like so many, only this time he asked God to kill him. He prayed to die right where he was. He asked God to forgive him for being such a trusting dupe. He asked God to hold his heart and his hand. He asked God to take back all the prayers that he had prayed in vain. He asked God to forgive him for hating his father. He asked God one more time to take his life and then he passed out.

       When John awoke, he was not sure how long he had been out. There was no electricity in this cavern of the Vatican. Priests were not allowed to wear watches or any other types of jewelry that related to the secular world. The things that he could wear were his priestly robes, his white neckband and the beautiful golden cross around his neck.

       When he came to Father John was still very lethargic. He somehow mustered the strength to sit up and lean his solid frame against the rock hard stonewalls of the Vatican’s hidden room. His thoughts wandered and he cried over people that he once loved and abandoned because they did not believe as he once did.

       John grabbed his throat and tried in some feeble way to choke himself. The tears flowed even harder. Several minutes passed and he gave up trying to choke the life out of himself. His thoughts raced. He thought about his father, that he had always considered an asshole. He thought about his mother, who had taken him to church three times a week and was the reason he became a priest.

       John tried again to raise himself to his feet. He pulled on the desk he was collapsed next to. He pulled on the candlestick, but the candle just fell. He picked up the candle because he knew that if he did not the whole room could burn.

       Father John Martin yanked the white piece of cloth from around his neck. He looked at it and then held it up to the candle. The cloth took a moment to burn, then it quickly incinerated in his hand. John’s fingers started to burn as the cloth gave into the desire of the flame. Another tear came down his face. He knew that his life had been lived in vain.

       What John had read was inconceivable, but he knew it to be right. He knew with everything inside him that it was right. John had read, among other things, that the Vatican and the Catholic Church was hiding the true names of God and His Messiah and had been since 1611. The conspiracy went all the way up to the Pope and had for generations. The power had been stripped from God’s name and His Messiah and this was just the tip of the iceberg.

story:
Let's Build A Time Machine!

I am not a quantum physicist.

Neither am I the leader of a psychedelic cult.

In my novel, "Breaking Yesterday," it takes a man who is a bit of both to successfully build a time portal to the past.

But you don't have him. You have me. And the only way I know how to do this is through my imagination and a bit of inventive writing. To bring that to life, I need your help.

The Story

You can have whatever you want. Under one condition.

Laurel Martin and Jig Klein have nothing in common other than a smooth talking abductor offering an enticing reward for their cooperation. The mysterious kidnapper claims to have mastered time travel, and they are free to use it to fulfill their deepest desires…if they first step 2,000 years into the past, kill the young Jesus Christ and forever wipe Christianity from the pages of history.

Friends and family launch a desperate search for the missing pair. They uncover a puzzle of ruthlessly executed technology, dark family secrets and a shadowy cult seduced by an ancient evil. An evil that will stop at nothing to reshape eternity to its liking.

Some Preliminary Reactions

"Brent Baker has masterfully melded two exciting genres in this gripping novel - spiritual warfare and science fiction. Buckle up, it is fast paced reading, start to finish!" - Steve M.

"The greatest compliment in my mind about how good a book is ... when you hate getting to that last page and you absolutely cannot wait for the sequel! That's THIS book!" - Stephanie H.

My Needs and Your Perks

The initial estimates for a successful time-travel expedition: $7,500 for all the basics. Quite a deal compared to hiring your friendly neighborhood physicist / cult guru. And safer, too. (Note that I've already filled the VISA up with some of this stuff!)

So, what's that go to?

  • An editor to professionally hone the manuscript. You wouldn't want to end up in the wrong year. Or have the story lead you into a dead end from which there is no return.
  • An artist to design a really cool cover so that people know what they're in for at their first glance. Besides, a time portal needs to look cool. At least, better than Marty McFly and Dr. Brown's DeLorean.
  • The first run of hardcover and softcover books so those who order up their voyage through time can be satisfied  in short order. Time travel should not involve delays.
  • A series of character portraits for the limited hardcover edition, created by my cover artist Caleb W. Knowlton.
  • Other production and marketing costs, like advertising, templating apps and a thousand other odds and ends that have to come together all at the same time.
  • What do you get? Check out the options in the "perks" boxes (you can get more information by clicking on them)!
  • If you have an idea for a different perk that you would like for donating feel free to contact me at brbaker@steepslope.pub.  There's probably things I haven't thought of! 

Bonus Goals

If we reach our $7,500 goal, there is more to be done that can take the book to another level! If we reach:

  • $11,000 - A lot of people love their audio books. I'll have it done professionally - that means NOT BY ME - so that "audio readers" can have it in their favorite format.

  • $14,000- There is a song involved with the climax of the book. I'll have the song professionally performed and produced to be released with the book. How many time travel adventures come with a song? This one could!

The Impact

The story is meant to be fun, but there's a lot to learn through even the craziest of tales. So, while the plot involves murderous time-traveling cultists, that's not all that's going on. At its heart, it's a story about faith and family, grief and betrayal, encountering God and deciding what that means. There are unlikely heroes and everyday villains, as well as ... well, I'm not going to give it all away here!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't support this project financially, there are other ways you can help!

  • Pray! Pray for me as I go through the publishing process for the first time and work with others to complete this project. That truly is the most significant way anyone can contribute.
  • Share this campaign with your friends and family via social media, email, phone or word of mouth. The more the merrier! The link is:  https://igg.me/at/BRBaker or you can use the Share button at the top of the page.
  • Check out my website - https://www.brentrbaker.com. If you like what you see, sign up for my email list to keep abreast of what's going on ... especially if I fall behind on getting everything done!
  • Join my Book Launch team! If you have creative ideas for how to spread the word about the book, get first dibs at reading the final product and have a chance to talk it over with me and other readers, and get a few goodies in the process, this may be for you! (The Launch Team activities won't start up until January.) I may not be able to take everyone, and it may not be what you want to get involved with, but there is more information and a chance to sign up here: https://forms.gle/2JkGfJNf5nkRX6uw9   (Of course, even if you do contribute financially, you can sign up for this as well!)
story_txt:
Let's Build A Time Machine!
I am not a quantum physicist.
Neither am I the leader of a psychedelic cult.
In my novel, "Breaking Yesterday," it takes a man who is a bit of both to successfully build a time portal to the past.
But you don't have him. You have me. And the only way I know how to do this is through my imagination and a bit of inventive writing. To bring that to life, I need your help.
The Story

You can have whatever you want. Under one condition.
Laurel Martin and Jig Klein have nothing in common other than a smooth talking abductor offering an enticing reward for their cooperation. The mysterious kidnapper claims to have mastered time travel, and they are free to use it to fulfill their deepest desires…if they first step 2,000 years into the past, kill the young Jesus Christ and forever wipe Christianity from the pages of history.
Friends and family launch a desperate search for the missing pair. They uncover a puzzle of ruthlessly executed technology, dark family secrets and a shadowy cult seduced by an ancient evil. An evil that will stop at nothing to reshape eternity to its liking.
Some Preliminary Reactions
"Brent Baker has masterfully melded two exciting genres in this gripping novel - spiritual warfare and science fiction. Buckle up, it is fast paced reading, start to finish!" - Steve M.
"The greatest compliment in my mind about how good a book is ... when you hate getting to that last page and you absolutely cannot wait for the sequel! That's THIS book!" - Stephanie H.
My Needs and Your Perks
The initial estimates for a successful time-travel expedition: $7,500 for all the basics. Quite a deal compared to hiring your friendly neighborhood physicist / cult guru. And safer, too. (Note that I've already filled the VISA up with some of this stuff!)
So, what's that go to?

An editor to professionally hone the manuscript. You wouldn't want to end up in the wrong year. Or have the story lead you into a dead end from which there is no return.
An artist to design a really cool cover so that people know what they're in for at their first glance. Besides, a time portal needs to look cool. At least, better than Marty McFly and Dr. Brown's DeLorean.
The first run of hardcover and softcover books so those who order up their voyage through time can be satisfied  in short order. Time travel should not involve delays.
A series of character portraits for the limited hardcover edition, created by my cover artist Caleb W. Knowlton.
Other production and marketing costs, like advertising, templating apps and a thousand other odds and ends that have to come together all at the same time.
What do you get? Check out the options in the "perks" boxes (you can get more information by clicking on them)!
If you have an idea for a different perk that you would like for donating feel free to contact me at brbaker@steepslope.pub.  There's probably things I haven't thought of! 

Bonus Goals
If we reach our $7,500 goal, there is more to be done that can take the book to another level! If we reach:

$11,000 - A lot of people love their audio books. I'll have it done professionally - that means NOT BY ME - so that "audio readers" can have it in their favorite format.

$14,000- There is a song involved with the climax of the book. I'll have the song professionally performed and produced to be released with the book. How many time travel adventures come with a song? This one could!



The Impact
The story is meant to be fun, but there's a lot to learn through even the craziest of tales. So, while the plot involves murderous time-traveling cultists, that's not all that's going on. At its heart, it's a story about faith and family, grief and betrayal, encountering God and deciding what that means. There are unlikely heroes and everyday villains, as well as ... well, I'm not going to give it all away here!

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can't support this project financially, there are other ways you can help!


Pray! Pray for me as I go through the publishing process for the first time and work with others to complete this project. That truly is the most significant way anyone can contribute.

Share this campaign with your friends and family via social media, email, phone or word of mouth. The more the merrier! The link is:  https://igg.me/at/BRBaker or you can use the Share button at the top of the page.

Check out my website - https://www.brentrbaker.com. If you like what you see, sign up for my email list to keep abreast of what's going on ... especially if I fall behind on getting everything done!

Join my Book Launch team! If you have creative ideas for how to spread the word about the book, get first dibs at reading the final product and have a chance to talk it over with me and other readers, and get a few goodies in the process, this may be for you! (The Launch Team activities won't start up until January.) I may not be able to take everyone, and it may not be what you want to get involved with, but there is more information and a chance to sign up here: https://forms.gle/2JkGfJNf5nkRX6uw9   (Of course, even if you do contribute financially, you can sign up for this as well!)

story:
Summary of Purpose

I am very thankful you decided to share a bit of your attention. I know the value of attention and how many things are simultaneously competing for just a few precious moments.  Out of respect for your attention, I will try to be as brief as possible while still being thorough enough to convey the necessary information. I encourage anyone seeking more information to contact me for a more thorough discussion.

When I set out on the path that brought me here, I didn't have intentions of writing a book or developing new concepts. As a young adult, it became evident that the current worldview I held lacked any real explanatory power. Consequently, I spent many years in isolated and independent research, the depth of which was not designed to develop expertise, but to discern what I could about Reality.

 Reality, objective: Capitalized in this context to denote that which is external of the mind. This use may refer to Reality as a whole or a specific part thereof, whereas the colloquial use of reality denotes an individual's personal, subjective definitions or assumptions of what is real.

The more I researched, observed, and interacted with others, it became very clear that there are two main categories of worldviews (approaches to interpreting Reality). The way we each interpret reality seems the obvious culprit for much of the world's strife and the difficulty found overall in addressing the human condition. The two main categories are:

a) Those based on belief, faith, or ideas of how it 'should' be.

b) Those based on what evidence, observation, data, and logic can describe.

Within these categories are all the religious, philosophical, and scientific worldviews, all of which have various interpretations. When these are embraced by their respective communities and take on specific methods and theories of how to view reality, they may be known as paradigms.

The lack of agreement on interpretation does appear to be the driving force of conflict between those operating within opposing paradigmatic views. However, what truly became a profound puzzle was that differing interpretations within the same paradigm also had dramatic negative effects and often with more dire consequences.

Moving downward in group size from populations that ascribe to a given paradigm to those that hold differing interpretations of the same paradigmatic fundamentals, downward again to the size of small and homogeneous sects, all the way down to any two individuals which outwardly share similar descriptions of their worldviews, will all have some variations in their interpretation and, likely, could hold to considerable differences of views with drastic interpersonal consequences. All of which supposedly exists under the auspices of a single paradigmatic worldview.

Yet, that is not where the disparity ends. Humans are capable of disagreement even within their own mind. Cognitive dissonance describes holding to thoughts and beliefs that are inconsistent with our behavior. Denialism refers to simply denying Reality in favor of something more comfortable or appealing. These and many other internal conflicts are quite avoidable within the correct frame of reference, but can be paralyzing when not addressed properly.

Disagreement upon reality is such a ubiquitous part of human nature it seems it is just simply accepted as unavoidable. However, I hope this book will demonstrate that disagreement only exists within subjective realities and there is no room for disagreement, or a great many other limitations on humanity, within Reality.

When you become aware of the inequality between what we think is real and what actually is real, you begin to see how this form of ignorance influences nearly every aspect of our daily lives and decisions. As I challenged my own views and eventually those of others, three principles, adopted early in my journey down this path, consistently guided the way.

 

Adapted from the field of medicine:

1) Symptomatic treatment has no place in a reality-based worldview: In other words, applying a feel-good bandage does nothing to stop the hemorrhaging caused by ignorance and false beliefs. You may kiss away the immediate sting of reality when it is not to someone's liking, but you have weakened your patient's immune system to further illness.

 

Adapted from the field of computer science:

2) Garbage in, garbage out: If your worldview is constructed from inputting nonsensical data, you should expect the output of your emotions and behavior to be equally nonsensical. If you hold a belief that is based on erroneous or misunderstood information, it is unlikely that your ability to affect or influence matters surrounding the 'bad data"will translate well to the real world, no matter how much you believe that it will.

As an example, if a friend tells you that today is August 1, but it is actually August 2, unless that is an important day, you may not be in too much trouble. However, if someone tells you that Friday is actually the day of the week that follows Monday, and you hold to this belief faithfully for the rest of your life, you are likely going to experience a great amount of turmoil that is going to make interacting with the rest of society quite challenging, even if it leads to a short work week! In addition, the more bad data you have in your programming, the harder it becomes to discern what is actually reliable information.

 

Adapted from the field of law within the social sciences:

3) Reserved Judgment: You should only ascribe to a belief or position if there is sufficient and justifiable evidence or logic to do so. In any situation where you hold to a proposition, you should constantly be willing to update or throw out the belief as new information becomes available. In the case that you are unable to reasonably support a belief or idea, you should withhold judgment until you have sufficient evidence to make a decision. Sufficient  evidence  is not satisfied by the notion of "beyond a reasonable doubt", but should be extended to "beyond the shadow of a doubt". When we adopt an incorrect view, it may prevent us from coming to the correct answer. To borrow further from the legal field, we should adapt what is known as Blackstone's ratio to read as; it is better that ten possible answers are denied rather than failing to arrive at one correct answer.

 

Bigger than a Book

From here, I trust that you will recognize the necessity of this work and the potential benefit it could bring to human society as a whole. If you have ever felt disheartened by the atrocities, injustices, or callousness of others, recognize the larger problem is that by giving credence to the implausible, you accommodate the existence of the injurious.

This book will not be presenting new research in the different academic fields it spans, nor will it be an attempt at a comprehensive education of the reader in those respective fields. However, I hope to bring relevant insights that offer the strongest support of the concept. Where appropriate, further readings and other informative content will be suggested should the reader desire to look deeper.

The first half of the book will address the supporting evidence and reasoning behind the concept. The second half of the book will be a complete presentation of the concept of The Inequality of Consciousness to Reality, including the conceptualized mathematical expressions and equations that offer an incredibly simple perspective and the philosophical argument which offers a compelling rationale for applying the concept in daily life. The book then concludes with what is meant by A Common Paradigm, why it is necessary, what humanity may look like united under such a common view, and what steps individuals and societies can take to embrace such a bold vision.

Although subject to change during the final stages of writing and editing, here is the current structuring of the book:

 

The Inequality of Consciousness To Reality

A Common Paradigm

Outline

 

  • Chapter One: Introduction: Scope and Purpose
  • Chapter Two: Defining Reality
  • Chapter Three: Defining Consciousness
  • Chapter Four: The Reality Interface and the Reconstructed Innerverse
  • Chapter Five: Epistemology and Ontology (Concerning Knowledge and Existence)
  • Chapter Six: The Inequality of Consciousness to Reality
  • Chapter Seven: The Goal State
  • Chapter Eight: Approaching R
  • Chapter Nine: A Common Paradigm as the Conclusion
  • Afterward: A Final Word on Education and the Sciences

 

Goals

To be clear, I am not affiliated with a university or organization and I have no publisher or any other resource to assist me in this monumental project. I have self-funded this every step of the way so far with an enormous investment of time and personal resources.

I believe, and hope you agree, that the time is now to bring this work to the public. We have made too much progress as an emerging global society to allow fake news, alternative facts, denial of evidence, and concerted deception to set us back.

I am setting the campaign goals in accordance with moderate to conservative cost estimates. In other words, I ask that the stated funding goal be taken as a minimum, and I would encourage those who are able, to give according to their means to propel this far beyond those minimum goals. 


Stated Goal: $3,000.00

Support for Completion

  • Remaining research expenses and professional consultation fees
  • Campaign fees and fulfillment of existing development expenses

Professional Services

  • Line editing
  • Interior design
  • Illustrations, charts, and tables
  • Front and back cover design
  • ISBN and related fees
  • Additional legal fees
  • Printing and delivery of books, including limited edition hard cover, paperback, and ebook

 

About The Perks

Of course, I believe that the greatest value is in the concept, itself. That being said, it is important to offer substantive perks that go beyond just pre-ordering the book. 

Paradigm Pioneers ($100 or more)

The Paradigm Pioneers, so named because they are the first to support the concept, will have a special and honored place throughout the future of this endeavor. This will be further defined as the organization grows, but the following are some of the advantages of becoming a Paradigm Pioneer:

  • Lifetime membership to the organization: No dues or fees
  • Lifetime membership to the access the websites paid content and services upon its future launch
  • Recognition of your early support on a special section of the website dedicated to the Pioneers
  • A special letter of acknowledgment of the significance of your early support
  • A permanent discount of 50% off all promotional merchandise made available through the website

These benefits are tied to the registration of the Paradigm Pioneer and are non-transferable, however, you may designate a recipient if you choose to gift the membership to another. At higher tiers, multiple memberships are offered and may be assigned as needed by the contributor.

 

List of Tiers

Be sure to read the descriptions of the perks, notes on pre-orders and memberships, shipping on add-on items outside of the continental U.S and conditions on coaching/consulting sessions.

Indiegogo limits 10 quantities total of items per perk, so there may be only a quantity of one listed in the perk, but may actually be multiple quantities in the descriptions. The quantities in the description are the correct amount associated with that perk.

If you have an idea for a perk or a special request, I am more than happy to negotiate! Be sure to contact me prior to your contribution if this is the case.

Here are the current tiers for perks available at the launch of Stage One:

Customized Contribution: Any amount

  • If you would like to contribute at a level for which there is not a preset perk, please email info@acommonparadigm.com with your desired contribution amount. Perks may be tailored to your contribution level and special accommodations may be available.

50% Discounts

Ebook $5: regular $10

  • ebook version
  • Deliverable upon publication

Music Download $10: regular $20

  • Deliverable within 48 hours
  • Music of Seekerxvii
    • The Goal State: Single
    • The B Plan: Album
    • A Cosmological Perspective: Album
    • Interstate: Short Album
    • Extras

Ebook and Music $15: regular $30

  • ebook version
    • Deliverable upon publication
  • Music of Seekerxvii (Deliverable within 48 hours)
    • The Goal State: Single
    • The B Plan: Album
    • A Cosmological Perspective: Album
    • Interstate: Short Album
    • Extras

Tier 1: $25

  • ebook version
  • Music of Seekerxvii
  • Letter of Acknowledgment
  • (1) Add-on item

 

Tier 2: $50

  • Limited 1st Edition Hard Cover
  • Music of Seekerxvii
  • Letter of Acknowledgment
  • (2) Add-on Items

 

Best Value, Tier 3: $100

  • Paradigm Pioneer Membership*
  • Limited 1st Edition Hard Cover
  • ebook version
  • One hour coaching/consultation
  • (3) Add-on items

 

    Notes on Book and Membership Fulfillment

    All versions of the book will be available upon publication, estimated completion by December 1, 2019. You will receive updates, and in some cases, content from the book until its completion. Once it reaches publication, your reserved copy will be delivered to the address you provide.

    By pre-ordering, you are ackowledging that you understand:

    1) pre-order fulfillment is estimated at December 1, 2019.

    2) Organization and website memberships come into effect when they are moved from planning to operational stages.

    3) Fulfillment dates listed in the perks are for the remaining perk items, and do not apply to books or memberships.

     

    Master list of all perk items available:

    Limited 1st Edition hard cover versions

    Coaching/Consultation 1 hour sessions (assignable)

    • Coaching is offered as Approaching Reality Coaching and must be within established life coaching rules governed by your regional authority. Consultations must be concept related topics or other pre-approved topics. This may also be a question and answer session, if so desired.
    • Valid after campaign completion
    • By appointment only, requires minimum 48 advance scheduling
    • Not available on dates indicating closed on website calendar
    • Other conditions may apply

    ebook version

    Letter of Acknowledgment

    Digital downloads of music from Seekerxvii

    • Usually available with 24-48 hours of posting your contribution (see Add-on Items below)

    In Addition, some contributors have access to the following add-ons. You may choose one add-on per tier level.

    Add-on items:

    • 18” x 24” campaign poster
      • Text
      • If, Then, Until.
      • Symbology
    • 8.5” x 11” author photograph (personalized and autographed upon request)
      • Close Up
      • Black & White
      • In The Shadows
    • Digital downloads of the music of Seekerxvii (original compositions written and performed by the author under the stage name Seekerxvii; more information at seekerxvii.com)
      • A Cosmological Perspective (album)
      • The B Plan (album)
      • The Goal State (single)

     

    A Vision of the Future

    It is my hope that you see the project as a vision of the future rather than as a snapshot of the present. To be successful, this will require a collective effort. Please share this page with your networks. Take the time to carefully consider just what this could mean for every individual and society and mention this in your discussions with family and friends.

    I am willing to take as much time as necessary to have conversations about why I believe in this concept and to convince you to share my convictions. Feel free to contact me through any of the available means on this site, through my website, email, or social media.

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If there is anyway you would like to contribute beyond crowd-funding, there are many needs that could be met through volunteering, pro bono, and other means. We'll find a way to work together no matter your skill set.

    Some examples of needs are marketing, community organizing and campaigning, web design, legal support, expert consultations, testimonials, reviews, and any other way you feel could be supportive.

    And that's all there is to it!

     

    Note: Technical issues are not allowing a connection through linked in. If you would like to connect with A Common Paradigm through that platform, here is the link: https://www.linkedin.com/in/acommonparadigm/

A Vision of the Future
It is my hope that you see the project as a vision of the future rather than as a snapshot of the present. To be successful, this will require a collective effort. Please share this page with your networks. Take the time to carefully consider just what this could mean for every individual and society and mention this in your discussions with family and friends.
I am willing to take as much time as necessary to have conversations about why I believe in this concept and to convince you to share my convictions. Feel free to contact me through any of the available means on this site, through my website, email, or social media.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
If there is anyway you would like to contribute beyond crowd-funding, there are many needs that could be met through volunteering, pro bono, and other means. We'll find a way to work together no matter your skill set.
Some examples of needs are marketing, community organizing and campaigning, web design, legal support, expert consultations, testimonials, reviews, and any other way you feel could be supportive.
And that's all there is to it!

story:
“The incredible thing about fairytales is not that they tell us that dragons exist, it's that they tell us dragons can be beaten."

 

SUMMARY

The Adventures of a Rogue Swan is an outreach project that uses ballet to teach everything from literacy to life lessons. We are fundraising for the first book of our children's book series, "La Sylphide." This book series is created by kids for kids. The book series will help children with their mental and emotional health. And not only does our series help introduce children to ballet, it provides a healthy escape from today's current pandemic issues.

Our child author and illustrators are immigrant students recently arrived in America. Most of whom are from Central America. They adapted and illustrated these stories in their English language classes.  The stories are adapted from classical ballet fairytales with the addition of more diverse characters and characters of color. Children need to see themselves, in all colors, in the books they read.

Copies of the published books will be donated to children in need. The books will also be sold on Amazon with any proceeds going to support the project and future book publications.

Our first book, La Sylphide is an exciting fairytale about a mischievous fairy who lives way up in the Scottish highlands. The fairytales explores themes of friendship, loyalty and courage. The book is for ages 3+ and can be used as a way to practice reading for older children.

 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

Donations cover the cost of:

  • Creating the first book of the series
  • Printing/Publishing
  • Distribution of the book to children in need.

Each book costs approximately $25 to create, print and distribute.

(Note: This also covers shipping books to organizations if we are not able to attend in person due to covid restrictions.)

The places we are planning to donate books include but are not limited to:

  • Low Income Student at Loudoun County Public Schools, Virginia
  • Head Start Preschool students

We will be adding to this list as we fundraise.

Have a place in mind where we could donate books? Let us know!

 

THE IMPACT

During the pandemic, more and more children are struggling with their mental and emotional health. Reading fairytales not only gives them some healthy escapism from their daily stresses, it also give them something to believe in and provides hope that things will get better. It gives them inspiration and the ability to dream. Children's emotional and mental health is so often overlooked and the value of reading and dreaming is not often acknowledged in today's society. But without it we wouldn't have our great leaders and our great accomplishments.

In addition, children of color are still being left out of children's books. Children's books are still overwhelmingly written by and written about white authors and children.  According to the Cooperative Children’s Book Center at the University of Wisconsin-Madison, Roughly 80% of the children's book world - including author's and illustrators are white. And only 14% of children's books are written with children of color as main characters. As much as we love so many of our children's books, according to Pew Research and the U.S. Census Bureau, since 2013 the majority of children born in the United States today are of color. And they need representation too, especially when they are young.

Become part of this incredible journey for the young children we support. Know that your contribution is saving a child from possible depression and isolation. Depending on your level of donation you will be able to engage with the children that you are supporting including being able to help choose where the books are donated.

 

THE TEAM

Student Writers and Illustrators

What is super special about our books is that fact that they are written for kids by kids. Our student writers and illustrators helped create our books that we are going to donate. These high school students are mostly immigrants just recently arrived in the U.S.

Also pictured are some of the Head Start students who will receiving the donated books. Head Start provides free preschool for families who wouldn't otherwise be able to afford it.

 

Matina Banks ~ Art Director, Project Director

Matina is a ballerina and producer born in Northern Virginia and raised in New York City. She started this project after using the arts to teach in New York City public school, most especially in the Bronx. While working in the Bronx, she fell in love with the children she worked with but always felt heartbroken that she couldn't do more to help them - especially teaching them not to give up on themselves or their dreams. Growing up as a mixed race person in the south was not an easy experience, especially as there was (and still is) very little representation of mixed race people in the media and in literature. The granddaughter of immigrants, Matina is very sensitive to the feelings that so many children are dealing with these days that can leave them feeling isolated and marginalized - no matter their backgrounds. She began dancing ballet at a late age (because she was told not to bother trying) and through her ballet company, Silent Fire Productions, and it's outreach project, The Adventures of a Rogue Swan, she is adamant about exposing young people to ballet and showing them how it can help teach and help heal.

 

Leah Court ~ Illustration, Typography

Leah is a UK based illustrator who graduated from university in 2019 with a degree in Graphic Arts. From paper cut to digital illustrations she enjoys experimenting with a variety of media within her work. She loves working with colour and appreciates the effect it has on the message being communicated. Her interest in and curiosity for exploring and learning more about the world around her led her to join this project. In addition to working on her projects with The Adventures of a Rogue Swan, she also freelances as a graphic artist for The National Trust of England. The National Trust is responsible for heritage conservation in the UK. For some of Leah's previous projects check out: https://leahcourt.wixsite.com/leahsgraphicarts

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

  • Please spread the word! Whether you are able to donate or not, you probably know someone who would enjoy being a part of this great fundraiser.
  • Do you know of a charity or program that would benefit from getting books? Let us know. You can contact us here through our Indiegogo page.

 

Check back for updates and more about this incredible project!

story:
Why Teams Win Championships

"Teams Win Championships - How to Create, Manage and Contribute to High Performance Sales Teams" is a non-profit book project written by a team of veteran business leaders.

After Andy Jaffke launched the project’s idea on LinkedIn in February 2020, his call to action attracted five authors with diverse backgrounds: Pablo Escobar, Mattia Bruzzi, Eddie Baez, James Craig and John Di Marzio. They were intrigued by the concept and were "all in" within a week. Originating from Spain, Germany, Italy, USA and Canada, they agreed to set up a virtual team by the end of the month.

In March 2020, they kicked off a powerful mission to co-author a unique and ground-breaking book dedicated to provide value to the Global Sales Community written by members of the Global Sales Community. This was truly the beginning of something special!

The original post can be found HERE.

Please follow our LinkedIn page where we post regularly about news and updates about the project as well as useful content around teamwork and team leadership.

We were greatly supported by global sales leaders such as Scott Ingram, host of the hugely popular podcasts Sales Success Stories, Daily Sales Tips and Sales Tech Podcast.

 

Here is the trailer of the interview with Scott: 

 

What You Get by Helping Us

The book has now been completed and is going through the editing phase. To help in covering the costs associated with final proofreading and creative/design services, we are requesting $5,000.00 USD.

This book is unique in three ways:

  1. It defends and promotes a paradigm shift in Sales from "I" to "We", promoting true teamwork and servant leadership as key elements for high performance sales teams
  2. It is a 100% not-for-profit project with all proceeds to be donated to charitable organizations
  3. The project was entirely designed and built from scratch, including the team genesis.

 

Simply put, we want to make a difference. Old antiquated sales practices need to realize that the sales world deserves much better.

We believe in a shift towards a more team-driven approach to recognize the contributions of people and teams that may not be directly related to the closure of a deal, yet are of crucial importance to winning.

Every dollar you contribute will be used exclusively to cover the costs for proofreading and creative/design services and the surplus will then be 100% donated to the charities we support.

We authors have nothing to gain personally from this project, other than knowing that we have given it our all to write an instructive book and help out some very worthy and deserving causes, especially in these challenging times.

 

The Book

If you are in sales, you should take notice. At over 300 pages with no fluff whatsoever, our book is packed with relevant and tactical information that can be put into action immediately for you and your sales teams. Please support our book project and take your sales game up a notch!

It is written in three parts:

Part I: The Team Genesis and Definition (Team values, Vision, Mission, Culture, Sizing, Communication)

Part II: Leadership and the Leader (Key traits, Servant leadership, Trust, Coaching, Crisis management)

Part III: Team Members: Hiring, Nurturing, Coaching and Renewal (Extended sales teams, Channel partners, Relationships, Commitments, Accountability)

 

The Big Challenge

Although writing this book was quite challenging in its own right, our biggest challenge is spreading the word to buy it. We hope to attract as many people as possible who can relate to its sales content and help the project become all that it was meant to be: A win-win for everyone who provides their support to this gratifying and worthy experience!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

It would mean the world to us if you followed our page on LinkedIn and shared our project with others that might be interested in a different view on Sales - A collaborative and selfless team approach!

Please take a bold decision today and join us as a patron here: www.patreon.com/teams

story:
Short Summary

In 2010, I wanted to quit my job and become an entrepreneur. In December 2012, I quit my job to become an entrepreneur and FAILED miserably! I lost everything because I did everything wrong and thought I could figure it all out myself. When I had to go back into the workforce, I felt so defeated. But going back to work was the best decision I could have ever made. While working I learned how to build and sustain several profitable businesses. And yes, I made some major mistakes along the way. While working with my business coaching clients, I share my mistakes, as well as how I built several successful and profitable side businesses the right way.

Now, I want to share this information to more people who want to start and grow successful and money making business while they are still working at their job. This book is a labor of love because I am transparent about my mistakes and failure (so painful to relive them). But, I feel it is necessary to let people know they are not alone and it is possible to be a DUALpreneur® (Employee + Entrepreneur) ... to eventually become a full-time entrepreneur, if that is their desire.

This book is being independently published and my team and I need your help to get this information out to the world. Thank you for your consideration and support!!!

The DUALpreneur® Bible:

  • Is written for people or what to start or grow a successful side business

  • Provides tools needed to increase the profitability of a side business

  • Teaches how to avoid compliance or HR issues with the employer

  • Is filled with real life examples of how to execute the steps to become a profitable DUALpreneur®

 

What We Need 

This is what we need to publish and distribute this book:

  • We need to raise at least $2,500 to publish The DUALpreneur Bible: 10 Commandments to Starting a Successful Side Business
  • The funds will be used for editing, book formatting, graphic designer, and publishing of book

 

The Impact

The book is written and designed to teach readers how to:

  • Execute simple steps to starting a successful side business
  • Create multiple streams of income to increase personal cashflow
  • Have a side business and leverage the benefits from the job
  • Have a profitable side business without getting fired from the job

 

Possible Challenges

Life happens and COVID restrictions may cause some delays with printing and distribution. The book is schedule to be published and distributed on March 20, 2021, but if there are any delays or complications, we will:

  • Communicate with you immediate of any issues or delays.
  • Provide an ETA of resolution and new dates, if necessary to reschedule.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, you can still help:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about this book campaign by sharing it with your network on social media or email list.
  • Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Thank you for all of your support! We appreciate YOU!
