story:
Short Summary

I am a screenwriter in Hollywood, but I have been in love with fantasy for ages. As a father of five children, I have personally navigated enchanting forests and bubbly brooks, and clever fairies of my own, while creating stories to tell my children at bedtime. I have a passion for storytelling and I believe that Georgiana learns some principles that  children and every parent, teacher, coach and business leader can also learn from.

A Pixie Day! encompasses the vibrant themes of self-discovery and healthy curiosity that are the pillars of solid character and good will. Through this work, I seek to inspire strength and confidence in children of all ages.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $15,000 to create and sell a  32-page beautiful hardbound and fully illustrated  children's book. We want to market this book to reach families who are seeking thoughtful and wholesome stories that they can read to their children. We also want to market this book to business leaders, parents, teachers and coaches who are looking for motivational messages, inspiration and insights into the art of setting and reaching goals and dreams.

We have several fabulous and unusual perks, one of which is rather amazing: The illustrator, Marina, will  draw you or a child right INTO an 11"x14" illustration from the book. Suitable for framing. How amazing would that be for a child (or adult)?

Whether we reach our goal or not, we will still use the funds to print books and market our project on social media.

 

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • We live in a world that has grown cynical in many ways. I hope that the stories of Georgiana can show how thoughtfulness, trust, curiosity and a little magic can help create a world of love, joy of discovery, and tolerance.
  • An important goal for anyone of any age is that of achieving success, discovering our unique talents, and grabbing hold of our dreams. This book offers a bright and cheery approach to dreaming and achieving those dreams. It's a bit of an old-fashioned approach in a world that could use some old-fashioned approaches.
  • I've written this story (and a few more) because I believe that there is a child in all of us that is searching for meaning and hoping to find out what our gifts and talents are. Georgiana has a unique journey. I think you'll be surprised at what she she discovers.

Risks & Challenges

Every publisher and agent I've talked to loves the idea of my story and the illustrations, but they seem to be looking for something more relevant to todays issues of sexual identity and acceptance. My book swims against the current and simply looks into the world of a young girl who wants to feel the magic and wants to communicate to the forest creatures around her. So, ironically, this book is not what publishers are seeking even though it's what children need.

I've owned companies, consulted to many individuals and companies, and  written hundreds of business plans. I know what it takes to achieve my goals and succeed. My goal is to not only publish my children's book, but to also market it to several different segments of readers.

In order to be successful, I am committed to an aggressive social media and advertising campaign, and make effective use of my 29,000 contacts and followers on Linkedin, Facebook and Instagram.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot or are unable to contribute money to my fundraiser, not to worry. You can help in other ways. Share this link with others and tell them about my book and my website: www.apixiesday.com

You can also follow Georgiana @apixieday

Thank you for your support and interest in this wonderful book for "Children of All Ages."
story_txt:
Short Summary
I am a screenwriter in Hollywood, but I have been in love with fantasy for ages. As a father of five children, I have personally navigated enchanting forests and bubbly brooks, and clever fairies of my own, while creating stories to tell my children at bedtime. I have a passion for storytelling and I believe that Georgiana learns some principles that  children and every parent, teacher, coach and business leader can also learn from.
A Pixie Day! encompasses the vibrant themes of self-discovery and healthy curiosity that are the pillars of solid character and good will. Through this work, I seek to inspire strength and confidence in children of all ages.
 

What We Need & What You Get
We are seeking $15,000 to create and sell a  32-page beautiful hardbound and fully illustrated  children's book. We want to market this book to reach families who are seeking thoughtful and wholesome stories that they can read to their children. We also want to market this book to business leaders, parents, teachers and coaches who are looking for motivational messages, inspiration and insights into the art of setting and reaching goals and dreams.
We have several fabulous and unusual perks, one of which is rather amazing: The illustrator, Marina, will  draw you or a child right INTO an 11"x14" illustration from the book. Suitable for framing. How amazing would that be for a child (or adult)?
Whether we reach our goal or not, we will still use the funds to print books and market our project on social media.
 

The Impact
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

We live in a world that has grown cynical in many ways. I hope that the stories of Georgiana can show how thoughtfulness, trust, curiosity and a little magic can help create a world of love, joy of discovery, and tolerance.
An important goal for anyone of any age is that of achieving success, discovering our unique talents, and grabbing hold of our dreams. This book offers a bright and cheery approach to dreaming and achieving those dreams. It's a bit of an old-fashioned approach in a world that could use some old-fashioned approaches.
I've written this story (and a few more) because I believe that there is a child in all of us that is searching for meaning and hoping to find out what our gifts and talents are. Georgiana has a unique journey. I think you'll be surprised at what she she discovers.


Risks & Challenges
Every publisher and agent I've talked to loves the idea of my story and the illustrations, but they seem to be looking for something more relevant to todays issues of sexual identity and acceptance. My book swims against the current and simply looks into the world of a young girl who wants to feel the magic and wants to communicate to the forest creatures around her. So, ironically, this book is not what publishers are seeking even though it's what children need.
I've owned companies, consulted to many individuals and companies, and  written hundreds of business plans. I know what it takes to achieve my goals and succeed. My goal is to not only publish my children's book, but to also market it to several different segments of readers.
In order to be successful, I am committed to an aggressive social media and advertising campaign, and make effective use of my 29,000 contacts and followers on Linkedin, Facebook and Instagram.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot or are unable to contribute money to my fundraiser, not to worry. You can help in other ways. Share this link with others and tell them about my book and my website: www.apixiesday.com
You can also follow Georgiana @apixieday
Thank you for your support and interest in this wonderful book for "Children of All Ages."

story:
Twitterism: Raise Your Voice - Learn how Donald Trump Tweets!

A scientific study of 35,647 tweets from @realDonaldTrump Tweets

I took a scientific approach to help explain the success Donald Trump has had on social media, Twitter. This comprehensive study shares interesting insights on how tone impacts social media engagement with followers in the case of Donald Trump. Have you ever been curious, what is the tone of Donald Trump tweets? Does his tone affect the way followers engage with him? Does he tweet angry or sad? Support this publication today!

 

This book, with a purpose, is designed to help create a conversation around what we can learn on what it takes to be a social media leader like Donald Trump. The tactics, style, jargon, use of sentiment, and willingness to apply tone to the frequencies of his message. I recommend this
book to you regardless of your party affiliation, role in society, and age (young or old). This book will help define what social media voice is and give evidence of the rise of social media leadership. The conversation starts with the leader, and it is up to the followers to participate. Their participation is measured, in this world of social media engagement, by the number of replies, retweets, and likes. The patterns that emerge can help us promote, persuade, and even place our messages more effectively to win over our audiences. The followers who embrace these messages, in turn, can raise their voice to either share the sentiments of the leader
or refute him. The digital era gives rise to not only the technology but a surge of change in what we say and how we must say it.

This book is an extract from my Ph.D. research on the content of Donald Trump’s messages on Twitter or tweets. It examines the content on the digital social landscape of how he uses his voice to engage with his followers on the social media platform, Twitter. A cross-sectional analysis of the @realDonaldTrump account identified 35,647 tweets with confident, analytical, tentative, sad, fear, angry, or joyful tones, as determined by the International Business Machines Corporation (IBM) Watson Tone Analyzer®, an artificial intelligence software platform. The data was categorized into three branded leadership personas: business executive, political candidate, and world leader. I encourage you if you want to see the science, to find the published copy of my Ph.D. dissertation “Donald J. Trump’s Social Media Voice Effects on Follower Engagement: An In-depth Tone Analysis of Leadership Personas in 35,647 Tweets from 2009-2018 Using Artificial Intelligence” on ProQuest here: https://search.proquest.com/docview/2320973045

Tentative Outline (DRAFT)

Title: Twitterism: Raise Your Voice: A scientific study of @realDonaldTrump Tweets.

By Ravi Singh

Introduction by the Author

Part One

1.       You Will Never Believe Me

2.       Practitioner to Academia

1.       Social Media is Powerful

2.       Disruption Innovation in Politics

Part Two

3.       Defining Twitterism

4.       Digital Rhetoric Theory

5.       Social Presence Theory

6.       Distributed Leadership Theory

Part Three

7.       Trumps Personas

8.       Trumps Tweets

9.       Trumps Growth

10.   Trumps Audience

Part Four

11.   Social Media Tone

12.   Social Media Sentiment

13.   Social Media Lingo

14.   Social Media Pulse

Part Five

15.   Engagement as a Measurement

16.   Creating an Empirical Experiment

17.   Using Artificial Intelligence

18.    Results, Graphs, & OMG !

Part Six

19.   Social Media Voice is here to stay

20.   Tone, Tone, and more Tone

21.   A Middle Range Theory

22.   Trump A Social Media Leader

Conclusion

Audience

This book is mainly for the Patriotic Americans born roughly between the early 1970's-2000's. Regardless of your party affiliation, or if you are a friend or foe of Donald Trump, you would be interested in how he tweets. Right?

 

Promotion

The book will be marketed through an aggressive online campaign. I will be marketing to my 70,000 followers on Facebook and my 12,000 followers on Twitter. We will deploy some if not all of the following marketing tactics:

A full-featured landing page for channeling traffic

  • Pre-launch preparation of reports, audios, and PDFs for giveaways to create involvement
  • A  promotion to establish a basis of good reviews before the book goes on sale
  • Pre-launch preparation of Facebook Ads, Press Releases, and Articles for guest blogs
  • Pre-launch release of media messages to insiders (email lists, blog subscribers, etc.)
  • Pre-launch book listings on e-book sites

Amazon, but not limited to other online and offline retailers.

COMING SOON! Thanks for your support!

USE OF FUNDS: To publish the book in multiple languages and distribute to a wider audience.

Launch a full website www.twitterism.com that will show real-time Social Media Voice analysis of @realDonaldTrump's tweets for the whole world to see!

For example, we know that Donald Trump is 75% Angry right now!

 

Video Pitch by Dr. Ravi Singh - Please support this dream!

Thank you in advance for your support,

Respectfully,


Dr. Ravi Singh

For more information visit: http://www.ravisingh.com

story:
The "Why" 

“Seoul Girl” Lost then Found (Story of a Korean adoptee and her journey from South Korea to the USA)

The warmth of the Colorado sun comes thru the windows as I savor my morning coffee with my loving husband and puppies around me. I have a good life. Going back about 60 years ago a small, scrawny baby was left at the front door of an orphanage many miles away in a crowded city of Seoul, South Korea. That fragile baby hanging on to a thread of life was named Adela Kim. And this is my journey from South Korea to America. From feeling Abandoned to feeling Loved.

Truly, the story started before I was born with the Korean War in the 1950’s. During this time many babies were born out of wedlock or left orphans due to the war. A couple named Harry and Bertha Holt were touched and moved by the stories out of South Korea of many homeless babies. Traveling to Korea and seeing the huge need for families for these children they started an orphanage called Holt Adoption.

I was born on June 10, 1960. These orphanages were started by the Holts on their own money and in sparse places. Where many abandoned babies died. God had His hand in my life and I not only survived but I flourished. There was a plan and a way for my life that would unfold many decades later. The huge blessing showered on me by God would completely sink in as an adult.

The reason why this campaign is important to me is to share the life of an adoptee and those who feel like an "outsider." Also, to inspire and learn from my story.  Like everyone I have had some great successes and huge failures.  No matter your background you will take away a nugget you can apply to your life.

I am grateful for each of the contributors and giving voice to adoptees or those who feel like they don't fit in. Thank you for reading and sharing my story to inspire others.

What We Need & What You Get

Here are the details:

  • Funding is needed to print, edit and market the book.
  • You will receive an inspiring book. Also, at certain levels I include handmade art, professional expertise and more.
  • If we don't reach our goal then we will look at launching again at a later date.

 

The Impact:

By contributing to this campaign you will give a voice to adoptees and those who feel like they do not fit into society:

  • This project is valuable to you as inspiring and gaining more insight to your life.
  • This is my first Indiegogo campaign but I have successfully done other crowdfunding for my husband's books.
  • I am a person of integrity and I follow through. When this is successfully funded then I will fulfill in a timely manner on or before the due date. 

 

Risks & Challenges:

The risks are not meeting the funding goal and the book is not published.

  • I am an overcomer and persistent. To the best of my ability I will make sure this is funded.
  • This crowdfunding campaign will be marketed in various medias such as social media, emails, phone calls and direct requests.  I have a large sphere of influence and I feel this will be completely funded.

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

Other ways you can help if not able to financially contribute:

  • Please share with friends and family
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools

Here is a video that Brad Hoopes did for me where he interviews me about my life growing up. Hope this video is inspiring.

story:
Thank you to everyone who contributed to our campaign. We have saved our store for now. Our campaign met its target goal and is now in what Indiegogo calls 'InDemand'. 

 

If you would still like to make a donation, you can, by selecting one of the perk packages available below. Any contributions we still receive will help us navigate this difficult period and make a huge difference. Thank you again to everyone who contributed!

 

You can also support our work on a permanent basis by becoming a 'Patron Member' of Ethale Publishing on Patreon. 

 

Short Summary

Last year we opened a bookstore to sell African books in Maputo, Mozambique. Books are expensive and rare even in the capital, so we wanted to create a space where emerging and established Mozambican publishers and writers could sell their books. 

 

Ethale Publishing was founded in 2016 by British journalist Alex Macbeth and Mozambican journalist Jessemusse Cacinda. The publishing house was born out of Festival Fim do Caminho, and has since evolved to publish 15 print titles (including by Wole Soyinka and Ngugi wa Thiong'o), develop an app for e-books and to launching a broadcasting arm, among other projects. 

 

We set up the store because we had to act to address the dearth of books in Mozambique. We invested our profits from other projects, as well as our own savings, to start it – it has been hard work! But in order to keep this space for writers, readers and the literary scene alive during this difficult period, we need a little support from any fans of our work out there!

 

Every donation is going to help us pay rent, which is literally going to help to keep the bookshop alive. By guaranteeing our two full-time staff (not the founders – we work pretty much for the love of the project) salaries, we can seek new business, which in turn helps offset any losses in the store. We need time to build a customer base and to market the store to make it sustainable. So every donation is literally going to contribute directly to making the bookstore a success. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We need a 6-month cushion to be able to weather the current pandemic. We had planned to fund the store with profits from other projects. Sadly some of those projects have fallen through or have been postponed because of COVID. All the money we get will go towards paying rent for the store, and to paying the salaries of our marketing and shop personnel (Halima and Winealine, see video). Any additional funding will be used to increase stock, cover utility bills or marketing or personnel costs  

We want the people who support us to become part of our work. Perks range from having a book edition dedicated to you, having a shelf in our store, or a section in our app, named after you. You can also opt to have an event created on a theme of your choice in African literature.  There's also one of our titles in English, t-shirts and Facebook shoutouts to be won! 

Our goal is to be able to raise 6-months of hard costs to be able to weather the coming months of the pandemic and be able to sustain the growth we have been experiencing in the last five years. Whatever sum we raise will put us in a stronger position with our landlord, suppliers and customers. 

The Impact

Our project is one of the only independent publishers and bookshops in Mozambique, a country of 30 million people. Your contribution helps us to continue to bring physical, and soon digital, books to children and other readers all over Mozambique. 

In 2014, one of the founders crowdfunded 1200 USD to start Festival Fim do Caminho, a film and literature festival in northern Mozambique. Four annual editions were held and 15,000 northern Mozambicans watched films, partook in workshops, attended literary forums or worked for the festival. Ethale Publishing was an evolution and is now the main event producer for the festival, which we hope to relaunch after COVID. 

Risks & Challenges

The book industry in Mozambique is nascent and weak. We know we have to convince people to spend their hard-earned money on books. But our client base is growing and we are set to reach  more and more readers, both digitally and physically. But some of that growth will be delayed by emergency restrictions due to COVID-19. 

 

We plan to expand to selling merchandise – clothes and Mozambican tech innovation (e.g. up-cycled objects) – to diversify and attract clientele. We have registered to be a 'hub for payments' too – electricity, mobile banking etc. But again, administration is slow in Mozambique, and it'll take time until these channels develop from investment into revenue. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

If you have read this far and don't feel you can make a contribution, there are so many ways you can help us.

  • Perhaps you can share the campaign with someone who is interested in the field and/or might make a contribution? Or perhaps you know somebody in the field who you would like to put us in touch with? Either way, please do get in touch at ethalebooks@gmail.com 
  • Do you have books to donate? We'd like to launch a second-hand exchange market or at least a jumble sale with second hand books in Portuguese and/or English. Please email us at ethalebooks@gmail.com if you can donate books
  • Maybe you know a company that would print books for us at a reduced cost, or support a book edition as part of their CSR? 

Please also use the Indiegogo share tools!

Help us invest in African narratives. Thank you! And hopefully see you soon at our store in Maputo.

story:
(This is written by Deb, Tad's partner & wife.)  Hello, fantasy and science fiction fans, and collectors.  We’ve had many requests for merchandise based on Tad’s books and worlds, but one way or another nothing came to fruition before now.  So Tad, Deb and a few close friends are making our own merchandise, exclusive to this campaign.  

Some of our friends have hung out with us since the internet first cobbled together a message board. 

Many of their ideas are in this campaign. Cindy and Angela especially are instrumental in creating tees. And when Deb discovered the work of Djamila Knopf, a star artist already in our world, it allowed her new ways to think visually about Osten Ard.

 


We want to make something lovely.  We're all putting pieces of ourselves into this and the pleasure of the campaign for all of us is making something with as much 'voice' as possible, too.  We've taken ideas from just two of Tad's worlds, namely, Memory, Sorrow & Thorn  and Otherland , because we all want to make things from those works.

We want to make something that's rare.  Almost everything in this campaign is limited to this campaign.  When the campaign is done, the print runs close.  (The exception is the Otherland tees, which are off on their own adventures, clothing characters in the OtherlandMMO game.)

We want to make something that's collectible.  If we sell the sort of numbers that reduce collectibility, we'll let you know and we'll give you options. You can, anyway, see the numbers we sell.)  There are things in here you can wear to a con, and unlike endless franchise-sci-fi or ubiquitous gaming shirts, maybe you'll own something cooler, and deeper.  And dare we say it -- the things in this campaign have friendship value, too.  

 

When the 'Otherland' tees came into being, a new young artist, Marz (Marlena K), joined to give us the Wicked Tribe monkeys...  

And then of course we joined forces with the Otherland Game people, producing tee shirts you can find in the game (and later, buy through the game.) This is a fun experiment for us all.

 

Right at the beginning of things, we thought of Isaac Stewart's majestic map of Osten Ard, drawn for 'The Witchwood Crown'. When he showed us the possibility of a metallic map, we swooned.  But the League of the Scroll pendants perhaps came first of all, because they already have a history, and everyone, but everyone, asked for them.  The first ones land on our desk very soon, and we'll update the campaign with photographs.

NOT EVERYTHING WE ARE MAKING has made it to this campaign page - YET.  So if you stick around for the whole four weeks, there are going to be SURPRISES.

Those are the outlines of our 'Tad Williams Is Making Merch' campaign.  We'll hope you'll see something you like enough to participate in our grand spring crowd venture!

PLEASE SHARE this campaign.  Please post this to your social media and, when you hear about it again in week’s time, post once more.  Remember, you’ve only got four weeks.  (Why don't you plan a few birthday gifts?!) Tad Williams merch is rare, and this may be the only time we ever do something like this.

( 3% of net profit from this campaign will be donated to Santa Cruz City Schools. Other charity donations are in development & will be updated.)

*************

NOTES TO HELP YOU WITH ORDERING:

* We had a bit of a struggle between interface & browser & unfortunately nobody won.  Deb couldn't make the options work for some of the perks. 

* If you go through the process but can't state size or selection, please simply complete the order.  We will confirm everything with everybody personally at the end of the campaign. We will in fact try to make this as customized as possible.  If all else fails, EMAIL US or whatever it is that you do via Indiegogo, & we will sort everything out.  Just stay in touch.

*************

A NOTE ABOUT THE GAME VOUCHER

How will I get my voucher/s for the Otherland in-game tee/s?

A: You will receive your voucher shortly after the campaign ends.  

*************

A NOTE ABOUT SHIPPING COSTS:

Shipping is worldwide. There are a number of errors in interface. Please simply pledge as best you can & all will individually & personally be fixed right at the end.

The 4-pack of tees and the map have no options for shipping costs.  Please buy anyway and at the end of the campaign we will contact you to confirm your selections, & ask you for shipping costs also, by PayPal if possible.  We guarantee everyone who buys something in this campaign will get their goods.

If you buy multiple things we will track them & when fulfillment actually happens, return any overcharge to you. If we can combine things & reduce charges, we will. Bear in mind that different manufacturing schedules might mean combining things isn't possible, if we want to get them to you in decent time.

IT'S ALL HAND CRAFTED, FOLKS.  Just like a good campaign should be!

You do realize, when the campaign's over, it ain't over.  I mean, you're going to be hearing from me, Deb, until these lovely Things come through your door.

*************

A NOTE ABOUT SHIPPING JEWELRY

Free shipping anywhere for this perk.

*************

A NOTE ABOUT SIZING: these are unisex tees. Please order a size you are generally comfortable in. When the campaign is over, we will contact everyone to confirm sizes and quantities, and send exact size charts to you so that you can be sure of the right size.

Tee shirt sizes: XS to 4X (4X only available for black- or white-background tee shirts.)

Hoodie sizes: S to 3X.

Please note additional charges for tee shirts: 2X $2, 3X $4, 4X $6.  

Please note additional charges for hoodie: 2X $3, 3X $6.

*************

HERE we are posting mock-ups of Things; they are nearly final designs.  We will add to this as we go along.  Things are fluid in a live campaign...


*************

VITAL INFORMATION FOR YOU TO MEET THE CREATORS.  Djamila Knopf web site: http://www.djamilaknopf.com. On Twitter: https://twitter.com/djamilaknopf?lang=en. On Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/djamilaknopf/?hl=en.  On Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/djamilaknopf/posts

Marz (Marlena K) - on DeviantArt: https://marzkartoons.deviantart.com.  On Twitter: https://twitter.com/MarzKartoons?lang=en.  On Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/marzkartoons/

(W&B) 2018. This venture brought to you by Tad Williams' Garage Of Wonders.

*************

HERE ARE THE FAQs, posting as they develop

(1)' Indiegogo didn’t let me state the size with the pledge, but I guess you’ll mail everyone later to get their sizes and/or selected prints for their T-shirts?' - Exactly. Hold tight till the end of the campaign, and we'll contact everyone to confirm size & preferences.

story:
The David the Dreidel - the Story

Who's that mensch with a pointed top? He spins all around until he goes plop.
He only shows up for 8 winter nights, to help celebrate the Festival of Lights.

Originally set to the tune of Frosty the Snowman, this story can be read or sung and will be enjoyed by the whole family for years to come! 

Help bring the legend to life and get your copy of David the Dreidel in time for Chanukah 2021! 

Get The Gelt

During this campaign, you have the option to purchase a durable paperback book featuring the antics of David the Dreidel, Chanukah greeting cards, and kid-friendly David the Dreidel stickers. 

Share the Gelt

Want to share the Festival of Lights? Get your copy of David the Dreidel and gift another copy to your local JCC or Jewish preschool. If you have suggestions of where we can send gifted books, please leave a comment or email us at davidthedreidel@gmail.com.

 

David The Dreidel - the history

The first few stanzas of David the Dreidel were written years ago, during my time as "Head of the Fun-raising Committee" and Marketing Coordinator at the Boulder JCC. I had a knack for creating parody songs like "Just Donate" and "Welcome to Purim". 

The idea behind David the Dreidel actually started as a joke. While planning our young professional Chanukah party, my committee convinced me to lead the opening ceremony dressed in an adult dreidel costume. Then, on the day before the first night of Chanukah, I wore the costume to the preschool and the kids lit up with excitement when they saw an adult-sized dreidel. The costume quickly took a life of its own, showing up at Chanukah concerts and community events, all the while making children laugh and smile! 

I went home buzzing with the joy of the holiday after one of these events and the song idea hit me in the middle of the night. For years it never went beyond my notebook or a few stray bars hummed with friends. 

Then, 2 years ago, my daughter was born and she instantly had a deep love for books. After celebrating this past Chanukah with her and seeing her joy when I sang the David the Dreidel song, I was inspired to turn the song into a full-length children's book to share with my daughter and kiddos across the world!

I am thrilled to introduce this heartwarming Chanukah story to families across the country!

 

How You Can Help

There are many ways you can help to get involved and make David the Dreidel come to life this Chanukah. 

  • Purchase a book for you and your family to enjoy

  • Get some add-on items, like David the Dreidel Chanukah cards, stickers, or extra copies of the book for friends and family. 

  • Get a Book - Gift a Book:  We're shipping books to JCCs and Jewish preschools across the country. If you have organizations that could use a copy, let us know!

  • Tell your friends, family, and local book stores!

If you have any questions or want to reach out, please email us at davidthedreidel@gmail.com.

THANK YOU FOR HELPING TO MAKE THIS BOOK A REALITY!

story:
Coming out can be scary, so don’t just come out, POP OUT! 

Let Me Out celebrates the journey of coming out, with the story following our main character who confronts those internal fears that manifest inside the closet, before finding self-acceptance and embracing their truth.

Everyone has their own story to tell. For me, coming out was a struggle that I now embrace wholeheartedly as an out and proud gay creative. I want Let Me Out to be a resource for children and adults alike, helping us embrace all the doubts, fears, and anxieties that we hide behind closet doors. 

It is time to pop-out of that closet and embrace who we are meant to be, because being different is what makes you unique.

What to expect with Let Me Out?

Coming out is, well… scary, and we wanted Let Me Out’s artwork to acknowledge that.  We also want to pay homage to our favourite gay icon – the BABADOOK, a horror movie character who was hilariously adopted by the LGBTQ+ community in 2017. 

We promise Let Me Out is not all scary – the book quickly goes from creepy to KIKI once those closet doors are opened, and that’s when the pop-out party begins!

Let Me Out is a celebration of embracing your truth, and anyone can take that message away from this book - regardless of who you are or who you love.

Why a Pop Up?

Why not?! 

 

Coming out isn’t one dimensional, so our book isn’t either.In today’s political and social climate, it’s our duty to resist, stand out and be heard- and what better way to cultivate confidence than with positive messaging that physically leaps from the pages of Let Me Out.

 

What exactly is hiding inside that closet? Well, you will have to purchase Let Me Out to find out, but trust us – this reveal will leave you GAGGING!

The perfect resource to celebrate You Being You!

Whether you want to remember what coming out meant to you, or share our book with someone who’s struggling with their own journey, Let Me Out is an LGBTQ+ positive resource in a world where such resources are few and far between. 

We’re hoping to schedule our first run of prints to coincide with National Coming Out Day in October, so let us come out of our closet and directly into your esteemed book collection!

story:
CHI SONO

Mi chiamo Krish Benvenuti e mi occupo di Yoga e Ayurveda.

Ho vissuto e viaggiato fra l'Italia e l'India, praticando, insegnando, creando eventi, scrivendo e cucinando 

Ho creato un progetto chiamato "Un insegnante yoga in cucina" organizzando cene, corsi ed eventi.

Poi...la scorsa estate ho vissuto una bellissima esperienza di due mesi a Cali, la città dell'eterna primavera, in Colombia dove sono stato accolto a cuore aperto...

IL SOGNO SudAMERICANO

Sentivo che era neccessario un cambiamento, avevo bisogno di rallentare per non disperdere le mie energie ed ho cominciato a sognare di ritornare a Cali...

Oggi ho l'oppurtunità di realizzare il mio SOGNO SudAMERICANO salvando un piccolo locale chiamato La Buona Forchetta.

LA BUONA FORCHETTA

E' un piccolo locale gestito dalla famiglia di un mio amico. Per varie problematiche ad aprile l'hanno chiuso e messo in vendita.

Il contratto scadeva a metà maggio e se non avessero trovato un acquirente, avrebbero perso tutto...

Ho subito pensato di rilevare il locale, trasformando in cucina vegetariana/vegana (comida naturalmente saludable – veg): l'occasione buona per tornare sostenendomi e mettendomi alla prova!


Ma per fare questo ho bisogno del vostro prezioso aiuto.

COSA MI SERVE

Almeno 6000 dollari!

Ho incominciato a pagare le spese in sospeso per fare in modo di rinnovare il contratto ed ho trovato un biglietto aereo per riaprire il locale entro fine giugno.

Le spese che dovro' affrontare, oltre a quelle personali, sono:

  • Acquisto della licenza e bonuscita che comprende il mobiglio e le attrezzature (14,800,000 pesos), che corrispondono a poco più di 6.125 $

  • Affitto (450,000 pesos al mese) e cauzione per un totale di cinque mensilità: 2,250,000 pesos pari a circa 930 $ 

  • Spese burocratiche e per le utenze: preventivate per 1,000,000 di pesos pari a circa 415 $

  • Prima fornitura di materie prime: preventivate per 1,500,000 di pesos pari a circa 620 euro

  • Acquisto di almeno 2 ombrelloni per riparare i clienti: 700,000 pesos pari a poco piu' di 290 euro.

  • Prima campagna pubblicitaria con materiali per volantinaggio: preventiva per 500,000 pesos ( ca. 210 $)

EVOLUZIONI FUTURE

Dalla scorsa estate, in Colombia, ho avviato collaborazioni con persone e realtà locali per diffondere la cultura di un'alimentazione corretta e naturale attraverso i fondamenti dell'ayurveda e dello yoga, riscoprendo anche tradizioni autoctone. La Buona Forchetta si prospetta come l'inizio di nuovi progetti:  un blog prima in lingua italiana (dove potrai seguire tutta l'evoluzione del progetto), poi in lingua spagnola e la pubblicazione di ricette, articoli e/o testi divulgativi.

PERCHE' AIUTARMI

I have a dream: prendermi cura dell'anima e del corpo attraverso l'alimentazione. Da sempre credo nell'Amore come atto di cura!

Il mio progetto in Colombia è coraggioso e ha bisogno di essere aiutato e incoraggiato.

I have a dream: diventa anche tu parte del sogno!

I have a dream: prendermi cura dell'anima e del corpo attraverso l'alimentazione. Da sempre credo nell'Amore come atto di cura!Il mio progetto in Colombia è coraggioso e ha bisogno di essere aiutato e incoraggiato.I have a dream: diventa anche tu parte del sogno!

story:
Dear all,
Some people have been expressing that they'd still like to donate, but the campaign is already closed. If you still wish to donate or know someone who does they are welcome to write a check for "Mireidys Garcia" and send it to my home address at 8 Colliston Rd. Unit 2 Brighton, MA 02135. I will be submitting my payment on June 30th because Indigogo takes 15 days to disburse the funds to me and because I'll be requesting a loan to make up whatever I can't fundraise. So even though the campaign is closed they still have till June 30th.

Thanks again,
Mireidys 

Help fund my attendance at the Ashbery Home School Poetry Conference in Miami Beach, FL. Contributions for the purposes of The Ashbery Home School must be made payable to Mireidys Garcia and are tax-deductible to the extent permitted by law.

More About the Ashbery Home School

I've been chosen to attend as 1 of 60 poets out of 200+ applications from all over the U.S. The Ashbery Home School welcomes poets seeking to redefine their practice through a radical consideration of the others arts—painting, music, cinema, dance, and new media.

The program consists of daily writing workshops, studio visits with guest artists as well as nightly readings by visiting poets. At the Ashbery Home School I will study with award-winning poets such as Adam Fitzgerald, Timothy Donnelly,  Cathy Park Hong, Mónica de la Torre, and Dorothea Lasky along with many more. I will get the opportunity to network and learn about the craft of poetry from mentors I have admired throughout my career and never thought I'd get the opportunity to meet. The Ashbery Home School is in partnership with the Bass Museum, Miami Beach Women’s Club, and the Wolfsonian-FIU Museum.

The Home School was created in the name of John Ashbery, a Pulitzer Prize, National Book Award, and National Book Critics Circle Award winner. President Obama presented Ashbery with a National Humanities Medal at the White House in 2012. At the culmination of the workshop I will get to meet John Ashbery himself, and perform my poetry for him!!!

A Second Chance

I was first accepted to The Ashbery Home School in Dec 2014. This was the first-ever opening of the program to take place in Hudson, NY in John Ashbery's very own 19th Century home. As you can imagine I was ecstatic to go, but was unable to make up the funds with my work-study student job. When I received the email from the Home School founder, Adam Fitzgerald saying there were only 5 available spots, my heart dropped knowing I would not be able to attend.

Months later I receive an email from Adam announcing the grand opening of The Ashbery Home School Miami Beach and I knew I have to find a way to fund my passion. Part of what makes the idea of attending the home school even possible is that my family lives in South Florida, so I will not have to pay for accommodation, making it more likely for me to be able to afford the costs. Also, because I was recently accepted to the Home School I do not have to reapply, but have only until June 1, 2015 to enroll, before they start their second wave of applications. If I let this opportunity slip me, it is unlikely I will get chosen to attend the Home School a second time, and even more unlikely for it to be hosted in my hometown, where I will have access to meals and housing free of charge. Please help me make this dream a reality, anything helps.

Meet Mireidys

Born in Cuba and raised in Miami, FL, within close distance of the sea, Mireidys aims to mimic that familiar fluidity of the ocean in her work while also capturing the sudden rupture of a wave. A writer of fiction, memoir, and poetry, she often plays with combining genres and incorporating visual, media, or sculptural elements into her work. Mireidys is also a bookbinder, aspiring publisher, and overall literature enthusiast. Her author website is www.mybefore.com/mireidysgarcia.

A political poet, Mireidys is the author of Letter to the Immigrant's Child, an interdisciplinary writing and book arts project exploring the multifaceted identities of young adults living in-between cultures. LTTIC comes alive in five poetry collections, five artist’s books, and a critical introduction on the process. During the making of this project she served as the researcher, writer, copyeditor, layout and graphic designer(s), publisher, book construction crew, illustrator (partially), and advertiser.

Letter to the Immigrant's Child has won Commitee's Pick in BookBuilders of Boston's 58th New England Book Show. Letter to the Immigrant’s Child was nominated for the Massachusetts Poetry Festival in May 2014 where she participated in a reading and Q & A as part of a panel of young poets addressing issues of identity. A copy of Letter to the Immigrant's Child was purchased by the Benson Latin American Collection at the University of Texas and by the Harold F. Johnson library at Hampshire College.


Where Your Money is Going

I am hoping to raise $1,665.00 to cover the cost of tuition and transportation to the conference and the fees associated with an Indigogo campaign. Tuition is $1, 175 and a flight from BOS to MIA is $350 for January 2016! I will cover my own accommodation. $138 will go to Indigogo for helping me host my campaign.

The Impact

Through my writing I aim to to give voice to those who have been underrepresented or misrepresented in the media, as minorities often are, while simultaneously, bridging gaps between generations and complicating stereotypical notions of what it means to be American. My commitment to misrepresented immigrant youth in this country is unyielding.

In the future I aspire to open my own publishing press, where immigrant stories can come to exist in digital and print - as an effort to reduce the stereotypical notions of black, brown, and ambiguously-brown cultures that so often sit on the shelves of bookstores across this country, our country. This would not only serve as a means of eradicating a sector of the problem of cultural misrepresentation, but also, empower youth to recreate their image, one that is true to the depth of their being.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    I know money doesn't grow on trees. If you can't contribute financially, don't worry! There are many other ways you can help.

    • Share on social media. Share by word-of-mouth. Share via email. Call up your friends and tell them. Blog about it. Just please help spread the word. 
    • Share with your school's writing program, your workshop group, your local bookstore, your local library, or any other arts patron who'd be interested in donating.


      My Eternal Gratitude,

      Mireidys Garcia

story:
Summary

ADHD, Tics, Anxiety, Tourettes, Bi-polarity, OCD, Anorexia, Rage etc. 

These symptoms can be caused by an infection! Get tested to find out.


"We are learning everyday how "infections," bacterial and viral, can affect our bodies in ways we never understood before. We already know these infections can trigger Mental Illnesses and Autoimmune Illnesses. Identifying the triggering infection can get you to the right treatment."

Times have changed. Mental health disorders traditionally “managed” through medication, therapy and special services are now thought by many credible scientists, researchers and doctors to be triggered by either a virus or a bacteria. Studies have shown that regardless of age of onset or how long the disorder has been active, knowing what may have triggered the symptoms and then treating any underlying cause, is critical to “recovering” one's mental health.

Unfortunately, no matter the research, no matter the papers, no matter the guidance from institutions such Yale, Harvard, Stanford and the National Institute of Mental Health, many doctors are not up to speed with current thinking, current testing and current treatments. Sadly, they are either completely uninformed or misunderstand what is happening to their patients. Their patients continue to suffer, often without ever knowing there could be something else wrong, something treatable, causing them or someone they love to suffer from mental health issues.

Our company is closely aligned with a non-profit organization that has been working to educate the medical community, schools and clergy about infection-triggered mental disorders since 2005 when three of the founder’s children became suddenly mentally ill. It turned out that the culprit, in their cases, was a common strep infection, not OCD, TICS, ADHD, Oppositional Defiance Disorder or Bipolarity, as the highly respected specialists at the time diagnosed. Once their mother's finally figured out what was really wrong, because they pushed for testing and were lucky enough to get it, all the children were treated for their underlying conditions, and in their cases, all three children returned to good mental and physical health. 

While the non-profit organization has done  good work, it has become clear that they can not get the word out fast enough to really make the giant dent necessary to help people figure out what may be causing their symptoms. Getting doctors to order the necessary blood work has proven difficult in part, because most doctors do not know what to order. Even if a doctor orders the right tests, getting them to understand what they are looking at and why the results may be pointing to an underlying cause for their patient's symptoms is even more difficult.

This is where ThinkInfection.com comes in (A project of The Think People, LLC). We have decided to take the almost impossible step that most people have convincing their primary doctors to order lab tests to determine if their mental health issue may be caused by an infection and provide those lab test orders directly to the patient.

We have also decided to take comprehensive histories from patients so that not only do we make sure that our doctors are ordering the right tests, but also so that we can gather data about what symptoms match what blood results for the general population. This will then allow us to provide the patient with their results as well as how those results may correlate with their symptoms.  In mass, this data (with no names or identifying information, following all HIPAA laws and strictly with the patient's permission) may be a critical component in future treatments and cures. Our hope and belief is that this information will help establish a way for doctors, in the future, to prevent mental disorders from ever taking hold in a person. 

**********As a side note, recent studies have shown that  many autoimmune illnesses such as Multiple Sclerosis, Parkinson's Disease, Autoimmune Encephalitis etc. may have been triggered by an infection or make a person more likely to suffer from ongoing co-infections as a result of a weakened immune system. As we grow, we hope to add blood tests that will help identify these triggering and co-infections as well, so that other avenues of treatment may be possible for patients suffering with an autoimmune illness. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are beginning our campaign by raising $20,000. These funds will allow us to complete our site, allow our team of doctors to develop a comprehensive health history questionnaire  and train and ready a small staff that will be there to answer questions and administer lab orders. With this initial amount, we will be able to accommodate 441  patients, providing them with lab orders and test results along with general guidelines for understanding those results. 

Please be aware, the $68 cost of our service only covers our ability to review your health questionnaire, provide you with a written prescription for the appropriate blood tests and return to you your blood test results along with general information written guidelines explaining your results. Once we send you the prescription for the blood tests, the costs of the blood tests themselves will either be covered by your insurance company and the approved laboratories under your plan, or you have the option to take the prescription to any local lab that is able to run the test at your own out of pocket expense. Again, to be clear, our fee only covers the our review of your health questionnaire, a prescription for appropriate lab tests, your results and general information written guidelines explaining how you and your doctor may interpret your results, not  the cost of the tests themselves and not an individualized result report. 

Coverage by your insurance for the cost of the actual tests will depend on your own policy. After you have signed up and completed the health history questionnaire, if requested, we will gladly provide you with a list of the blood work that will be ordered on the lab slip, so that you can contact your insurance company and make sure you have coverage for those tests and so that you can find out which labratory your insurance requires you to use.  You may also want to contact your lab of choice to determine if they will be able to perform all of the tests in their facility or if you will have to go to another lab to complete the order. 

If you decide, for whatever reason, that you do not wish to use our service after all, just let us know prior to our issuing you your prescription and we will gladly refund your payment in full. You are then welcome to take the list of tests with you to your own doctor for further discussion. 

We are planning to continue our campaign through Indiegogo's "in demand" program so that we will keep growing as more and more people become aware that we are providing these services. As time goes on we hope to expand our services to include direct doctor/patient consultations to people who wish to work with one of our specialists. For now, we will do our best to provide patients with documented lab results that they can take to their own doctors or to a doctor referred by several organizations that are online providing patient information and referrals. 

If we do not reach our initial goal in full at the end of this initial 60 day campaign, we will use what funds we have to work with our doctors to complete our comprehensive health history questionnaire, and then we will make sure that those people who have paid for our services receive appropriate prescriptions for lab tests. At that point we will continue with our ongoing campaign to provide much needed lab test orders to individuals needing answers and we will work to complete our site.

Our "Perks" are set up based on future services rendered. If you are just a good person who wants to support us and our mission, you can "donate" your perk (see the Perk section) to someone in need. Once we launch, we will maintain a fund for people who tell us they can't afford our help. If the funds are there, we will use them. If not, people can choose to be on our waiting list and as the funds come in we will contact them. It is our ultimate goal to help as many people as we can to uncover what has caused their mental disorder and determine the best way forward to a healthier happier life. 

The Impact

Believe it or not, according to the World Health Organization, there are 450 million people diagnosed with a mental health disorder each and every year. That number is expected to double by 2020.  We believe that as much as 60% of those 450 million people have or had a triggering infection that caused their symptoms. Even if that percentage turns out to be a smaller number of affected people, imagine how many people could be helped if they knew that an infection was causing their disorder. To say knowledge is power in this case is truly an understatement. At the most, this knowledge could save a life, at the least it could make life so much more livable for millions of people and the families and friends and teachers and coworkers who must make it through each day, through all the trials and tribulations that go hand in hand with caring about someone who is suffering with a mental disorder. 

Risks & Challenges

Building a website such as ours is often more complicated than you think it is going to be. As you build it, you think of more and more things that will make the site better and that makes its creation more costly. We are working with some fantastic tech developers who are passionate about the topic and have pushed us to lay out the sites features to the best of our ability before they build it. They have agreed to stick with us as we grow and build the site in such a way that we can add new features as needed as cost effectively as possible.

Regulations and laws in each state are different regarding the new field of tele-medicine. Some states require that even though we are only providing prescriptions for lab work we must have a prescribing doctor in that particular state in order to write prescriptions. Other states simply will not allow us to operate. We are members of the Association of Tele-medicine. We are actively keeping tabs of what the new and upcoming laws in each state are. One thing is for sure...the changes will only be in our favor as the demand for services through technology grows. Tele-medicine is here to stay and grow, and so are we. If it turns out that we are unable to provide you with services due to specific state laws, we will provide you with a full refund. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you believe in what we are doing, but just can't contribute at this time, please pass on our information to all the people you know. We guarantee that there is almost no one you know that does not care about, work with, or is related to someone who is suffering with a mental disorder. Even if you are lucky enough not to need our help personally, they do. Please let them know we are here.

Thank you for taking your time to look at our campaign.

story:
"El humor alivia el dolor"

ClownCelulaRoja, es una ONG conformada por artistas profesionales especializados en la metodologia de Clown de Hospital, que nació el 2007 en Chile y desde el 2011 también existe en Ecuador, nuestro objetivo es llevar nuestro programa de Clown de Hospital a niños y adultos hospitalizados para apoyar los procesos emocionales por los que pasan durante su enfermedad y tratamiento. Existen numerosas investigaciones sobre los beneficios que tiene el buen humor y la risa como apoyo de tratamientos médicos y nosotros trabajamos en ello creando un ambiente alegre y estimulante a través del humor, la música, el juego creativo y las relaciones saludables, mejorando su calidad de vida. 

Necesitamos financiar visitas de Clowns de Hospital semanales durante todo el año para llevar alegría a un Hospital de Quito. Los hospitales en Quito no tienen fondos para financiar este tipo de programas pero si muchas ganas de que se puedan realizar en ellos, y hay muchos que están esperando!
Para conocer más sobre nosotros visita www.clowncelularoja.com 
Cómo distribuiremos tu aporte..

Necesitamos recaudar USD $20.000 idealmente, estos fondos financiarán 2 visitas semanales de nuestro equipo en 1 Hospital de Quito durante todo el año y además ayuda a sustentar la base económica para el funcionamiento de ClownCelulaRoja, esto se divide en:

- Trabajo activo en hospitales / Supervisión continua en hospitales incluyendo reuniones con equipo e informes del trabajo realizado / Entrenamientos artísticos / Sesiones  de autocuidado y asesoramiento con una psicóloga / Materiales, vestuarios e insumos, entre otros.

Si es que no logramos llegar a nuestra meta, los fondos recaudados se utilizarán para el mismo objetivo pero con menos tiempo de duración, eso dependerá de la cantidad de dinero recaudada. En caso de superar la meta, podriamos aumentar la cantidad de visitas por semana ó incluso visitar más hospitales!!!

El impacto que lograremos y el que ya hemos logrado...

Con este financiamiento y gracias a tu valioso aporte, podremos visitar a un promedio diario de 25 niños hospitalizados y sus familias, más 350 usuarios que asisten a consulta externa y esto también incluye al personal de salud que trabaja en el hospital, dando un promedio anual aproximado de: 5.100 personas que serán beneficiadas directamente.

Este es un proyecto que ya ha sido puesto en marcha en diferentes hospitales de Quito desde el 2011, obteniendo muy buenos resultados a nivel de la respuesta positiva y afectiva de los pacientes, ya que al encontrarse en una situación vital tan compleja, necesitan estimulación, reír, jugar y relacionarse positivamente con sus familias y el personal de salud, sentirse bien, alegres y saludables y esto mejora su predisposición al tratamiento y a la manera en la que afrontan la vida. 

¿Porque necesitamos financiamiento y no lo hacemos voluntario?

Cuando hablamos de Clown de Hospital profesional, nos referimos a que vemos muy importante el entregar un servicio de calidad tanto a nivel artístico como humano y para eso se necesita tener un equipo formado y capacitado, que esté constantemente trabajando para mejorar en lo que hace y que se dedique el tiempo necesario para hacerlo, es por esto que debe ser remunerado ya que es tiempo muy valioso y constante el que deben dedicar a ser un Clown de Hospital profesional.  

Como organización hemos trabajado arduamente en validar esto como un complemento terapéutico e insertarnos como un apoyo a los equipos de salud en hospitales tal como funciona en muchos países de Europa, en Canadá, EEUU, Israel, Brasil, entre otros, en esto hemos obtenido grandes logros:

CHILE: 8 años de trabajo constante reconocidos por los hospitales

Ya somos parte del equipo de salud de 3 hospitales de Santiago contratados por los hospitales y hemos sido ganadores por 2 ocasiones de los fondos de cultura Fondart del Ministerio de Cultura de Chile, siendo un referente dentro de las organizaciones de ese país: Actualmente trabajamos en

* Instituto de Neurocirugía C. Asenjo

* Centro de trasplante y oncología integral TROI - Hospital Luis Calvo Mackenna

* Complejo Hospitalario San José

Además hemos trabajado en el Hospital de Carabineros de Chile, Hospital Clinico Félix Bulnes y de manera esporádica en Clinica Alemana, Clinica Universidad Católica y Fundación AlterEgo

ECUADOR: En 3 años de trabajo, hemos llegado a más de 200.000 personas

Comenzamos el 2011 con financiamiento de empresas insertándolo en 5 Hospitales: Hospital oncológico Solca, Hospital de niños Baca Ortiz, Hospital de los Valles, Clinica Internacional y Clinica Pichincha. 

Luego de esta etapa logramos ser validados y reconocidos por el Ministerio de Salud Pública del Ecuador, quien respaldo el proyecto y apoyó la puesta en marcha otorgando financiamiento para que funcione 5 veces por semana en el Hospital de niños Baca Ortiz, los años 2012 y 2013, pero sólo otorga financiamiento para Hospitales del estado, es por esto que no obtenemos ese beneficio para nuestro programa en otros hospitales y lamentablemente por razones políticas el apoyo concreto es variable e inestable, lo que nos tiene actualmente sin ningún tipo de financiamiento.

En Ecuador esto aún es nuevo y desconocido, por eso es muy lenta y difícil la obtención de financiamiento por parte de empresas ó el estado, pero el interés en los hospitales es alto! No queremos que nuestro trabajo en los Hospitales se postergue ni se estanque más, es por esto que necesitamos independizarnos y eso lo lograremos con tu ayuda!

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Si no puedes colaborar económicamente, o quieres ayudarnos más de lo que puede tu bolsillo, ayúdanos difundiendo nuestra campaña y así ayudarás a que cientos de niños con cáncer vivan su tratamiento alegres y riendo gracias a las visitas de nuestro equipo de Clowns de Hospital!!!

story:
Short Summary


My name is Tom Creaghan and I am asking for support in publishing my book “Talented Miramichers in the Gilded Age”. It is the story of a successful Irish family, the Adams, who made it big at home, in Colorado and New York. It covers the history of each area including the spread of the industrial revolution, the age of moguls, the gold standard and how the rich got richer. It deals with the history of Miramichi from the days of timber exporting through the age of wind and sail, the sawmill age down to the age of pulp mills. Because of the various connections, it also touches on the history of silver mining in Colorado and the department store industry in New York, including the “Ladies Mile” shopping district. The story gives an account of politics from the days of Canadian Confederation to New York’s Tammany Hall and onto Colorado’s struggle over bi-metallic currency. The Miramichers in this story were active in each area.

In many ways the Adams’ experiences resemble those of the fictional characters created by Mark Twain and Charles Warner in their 1870’s novel “The Gilded Age”. As in that novel, the Adams boys encounter bumps and setbacks along the wayincluding scandal and illicit romance. Twain’s fictional family had some of the same goals and lived in the same period in America but the Adams boys were more in politics, their mining ventures and other entrepreneurial endeavors. In different ways however, both stories portray the wonders and follies of the age.

story:
A jövő egyértelműen a közösségi finanszírozásé,


a crowdfunding nevű közgazdasági szupersztáré, 
amely legalább akkora paradigmaváltást hoz a tartalomgyártásban, 
mint maga az internet a kommunikációban.



Mi is ezért fordulunk most Hozzátok. 

Azt a 250 embert tervezzük megtalálni egy hónapon belül, akik a szívük egy kis darabját odaadják nekünk, mert megérinti őket mindaz az erőfeszítés, amit eddig tettünk azért, hogy egy álmunk valóra váljon.

Sok kis szívdobbanás sokra megy, sok kis vállveregetés sokra megy, sokszor 10 dollár sokra megy úgy, hogy mindez az egyénnek csekélység, gesztus, biztatás, az adakozás apró öröme - nekünk pedig minden.


A közösségi finanszírozás egyszerre piackutatás és értékesítés.
Nincs érdektelen vagy ellopott digitális tartalom. 


Zseniálisan old meg egyszerre egy sor alapvető problémát, melyre eddig külön-külön hasztalanul kerestük a megoldást.
Adódik tehát a kézenfekvő döntés: a mi közösségi finanszírozás alapú projektünk feltőkésítéséhez naná, hogy a közösségi finanszírozás erejét vetjük be.

Mi a hangoskönyvek szerelmesei vagyunk.
"A projekt akkor indult, amikor egy napon azon merengtem a szobámban, hogy az évek során a könyvespolcra összevásárolt könyveim elolvasására talán soha nem lesz időm, miközben havi több ezer km-t vezetek teljes magányban. Nemsokára ezután azon kaptam magam, hogy színészekkel, hangmérnökökkel és programozókkal éppen a könyvpiac felforgatásának alapjait rakjuk le." Dr. Peter Vaczi

A legnagyobb fejtörést a torrent jelentette és az a frusztráló tény, hogy a világ legnagyobbjai is tehetetlenül állnak a probléma előtt.

"Ami még nem készült el, azt el sem lehet lopni és csak az készül el, ami ki van fizetve! Szederjesre csapkodtam a homlokomat, amikor összeállt a kép a közösségi finanszírozás és a hangoskönyvgyártás vonatkozásában." Dr. Peter Vaczi

Egy vadonatúj koncepció jelenti a frappáns megoldást a tartalomgyártást aláásó legkomplexebb probléma kiiktatására. A lelkes közönség fogja apránként előre összedobni azt a pénzt, amiből ki lehet fizetni például a profi narrátor tiszteletdíját. Nem nekünk kell törni a fejünket, hogy milyen címeket jelentessünk meg, miből finanszírozzuk a hangoskönyvek elkészítését és hogyan akadályozzuk meg a tartalmak tömeges ellopkodását.

Most először a közösséghez fordulunk. Azokból az emberekből építünk bázist, akik szeretik a hangoskönyveket és akiknek szimpatikus mindaz, amiért dolgozunk.


Ha olvasni nincs is mindig időd,

hallgatni szinte bármikor lehet a könyveket - most már magyarul is!


  • Visszaadja az eddig értelmetlenül elpazarolt időt, amit autóban ülve vagy házimunkával végzel. Ezentúl keresni fogod az ilyen alkalmakat.

  • Elérhető lesz idővel mindenféle könyv: szabadidőre, önképzésre, ismeretterjesztésre, a gyerekek lefoglalására.

  • A külföldön született ifjúság számára segít megőrizni a magyar nyelvet, megismerni a magyar irodalom legjobbjait - a meséktől, az ifjúsági regényeken át a tankönyvekig.


Mindez pofonegyszerűen: netről telefonra, tabletre vagy akár egy pendrive-ra az autóban. Pofátlanul olcsón.

A technológia és az első félszáz mű készen van, elérhető. Viszont minél gyorsabban szeretnénk az elérhető hangoskönyvtárat bővíteni. Ehhez most még szükségünk van vállveregetésedre és némi apróra Tőled. Nyomj egy barackot a fejünkre, vedd elő a hitelkártyád, merengj el mennyi legyen az annyi és küldd a lét! Nem leszünk hálátlanok. Összeraktunk egy kis svédasztalt itt jobbra, ebből lehet szemezgetni, szerintünk hűde korrektre sikerült.

Kérjük, támogass minket, ha szimpatikus számodra törekvésünk. Béta oldalunk még csak a jéghegy csúcsa, fejlesztéseink ott hevernek papíron és tőkeinjekcióra várnak.


Mire is fordítjuk majd a támogatásodat?

Célunk az, hogy be tudjuk fejezni legalapvetőbb fejlesztéseinket, pl. egy olyan adatbáziskezelő szoftvert, amely nem látványos, mert a háttérben fut. Ennek a költsége 2540 dollár, enélkül nem tudunk továbblépni.

Ha nemcsak pár dollárral segítesz, hanem azzal is, hogy megosztod ezt a kampányt másokkal, akik örömmel csatlakoznak hozzánk, akkor előfordulhat, hogy a célösszeg többszöröse is összejön. 20.000 dollárból pl. már le tudjuk programozni tervezett aggregátorunk mobil applikációját.

A továbbiakba egyelőre nem merünk belegondolni.


Mit is kínálunk cserébe támogatásodért?

Olyan viszonzásokat, azaz PERK-eket állítottunk össze, amelyek elegánsan bőkezű ár/érték arányt képviselnek és nem kell lesütnünk a szemünket, amikor átnyújtjuk.

  • Válassz egy PERK-et!

  • A választott PERK-nek megfelelő számú VOUCHER korlátlan ideig felhasználható, beváltása akár a tartalombővítés utánra is halasztható.

  • Regisztrálj honlapunkon, és váltsd be a VOUCHER-eket, vagy tárold el későbbre!

  • Ha van kedved, iratkozz fel hírlevelünkre, hogy kedvenc könyveid megjelenéséről időben értesülj.




A jövő


Könyv és olvasó - múzeumi fogalmakká halványulnak.

Cím lesz és fogyasztó.


Az irodalomfogyasztó a thevoicean.com aggregátoron kiválasztja a címet (az irodalmi művet) és eldönti, hogy milyen formában óhajtja befogadni. 

Eldönti, hogy ropogós, illatos, nyomtatott formában szeretné a művet vagy zsebrevágja többezer eBook-ja közé. 

Elolvassa vagy éppen meghallgatja, esetleg mindkettő.  

Mi már elkezdtük építeni az aggregátort, melynek részese lehetsz Te magad is. Nemcsak pár dolláros támogatásoddal, hanem azzal, hogy majd szavazol egy hiányzó formátumra. 



Nincs meg kedvenc műved hallgatható formában? 

Nincs belőle eBook? 

Szavazz rá és mi megcsináljuk!

Mindez pofonegyszerűen: netről telefonra, tabletre vagy akár egy pendrive-ra az autóban. Pofátlanul olcsón.
A technológia és az első félszáz mű készen van, elérhető. Viszont minél gyorsabban szeretnénk az elérhető hangoskönyvtárat bővíteni. Ehhez most még szükségünk van vállveregetésedre és némi apróra Tőled. Nyomj egy barackot a fejünkre, vedd elő a hitelkártyád, merengj el mennyi legyen az annyi és küldd a lét! Nem leszünk hálátlanok. Összeraktunk egy kis svédasztalt itt jobbra, ebből lehet szemezgetni, szerintünk hűde korrektre sikerült.
Kérjük, támogass minket, ha szimpatikus számodra törekvésünk. Béta oldalunk még csak a jéghegy csúcsa, fejlesztéseink ott hevernek papíron és tőkeinjekcióra várnak.

Mire is fordítjuk majd a támogatásodat?

Célunk az, hogy be tudjuk fejezni legalapvetőbb fejlesztéseinket, pl. egy olyan adatbáziskezelő szoftvert, amely nem látványos, mert a háttérben fut. Ennek a költsége 2540 dollár, enélkül nem tudunk továbblépni.
Ha nemcsak pár dollárral segítesz, hanem azzal is, hogy megosztod ezt a kampányt másokkal, akik örömmel csatlakoznak hozzánk, akkor előfordulhat, hogy a célösszeg többszöröse is összejön. 20.000 dollárból pl. már le tudjuk programozni tervezett aggregátorunk mobil applikációját.
A továbbiakba egyelőre nem merünk belegondolni.

Mit is kínálunk cserébe támogatásodért?
Olyan viszonzásokat, azaz PERK-eket állítottunk össze, amelyek elegánsan bőkezű ár/érték arányt képviselnek és nem kell lesütnünk a szemünket, amikor átnyújtjuk.

Válassz egy PERK-et!
A választott PERK-nek megfelelő számú VOUCHER korlátlan ideig felhasználható, beváltása akár a tartalombővítés utánra is halasztható.
Regisztrálj honlapunkon, és váltsd be a VOUCHER-eket, vagy tárold el későbbre!
Ha van kedved, iratkozz fel hírlevelünkre, hogy kedvenc könyveid megjelenéséről időben értesülj.




A jövő

Könyv és olvasó - múzeumi fogalmakká halványulnak.
Cím lesz és fogyasztó.

Az irodalomfogyasztó a thevoicean.com aggregátoron kiválasztja a címet (az irodalmi művet) és eldönti, hogy milyen formában óhajtja befogadni. 
Eldönti, hogy ropogós, illatos, nyomtatott formában szeretné a művet vagy zsebrevágja többezer eBook-ja közé. 
Elolvassa vagy éppen meghallgatja, esetleg mindkettő.  
Mi már elkezdtük építeni az aggregátort, melynek részese lehetsz Te magad is. Nemcsak pár dolláros támogatásoddal, hanem azzal, hogy majd szavazol egy hiányzó formátumra. 



Nincs meg kedvenc műved hallgatható formában? 
Nincs belőle eBook? 
Szavazz rá és mi megcsináljuk!

story:
In New Eden, the Prophet Adam works to purify humanity and bring back the blood of the first man. 

Every impurity is tattooed across your skin, to identify you to the world either as a tainted Child of Eve or as a half-human Child of Lilith. Only the Children of Adam live with human names and untattooed skin. 

Thrush is the only daughter of a Daughter of Adam and Son of Lilith. Tattooed with the stained lotus of a tainted Child of Eve, she has until the age of 17 to prove herself a true daughter of Adam and be named? 

Together with her best friend Lynx, Thrush navigates a world where no flaw is invisible, and makes you less than human. That is until her best friend is kidnapped and the only way to get her back to volunteer to be a player in the Blood Hunt. 

 Will she be able to save her friend, or will she lose her chance at being human and her life? 

Can I finish writing Hunting Blackbirds in 48 hours?

I am spending this weekend in a hotel. I don't have to cook, or clean, or really do anything other than write. I plan on devoting my time to making this novel happen. I will start writing at Midnight, and keep working until I finish or my time runs out. 

  • Everyone who donates will get a copy of what I've managed to produce as a PDF copy on Monday, whether I finish the story or not. 
  • I will keep writing the story and work on getting it published and when it is, everyone who donated $5 or more will received an ebook version of the finished manuscript. 
  • I will live blog on my FB page and tweet the writing process, letting people know how far I've gotten, as well as giving sneak peeks of what has been written.


Why the money? 

This campaign serves two purposes: forcing me to write this story by making me accountable to others and helping raise money for the development of a new publishing company: Burning Bridges. 

The money will be used to help publish this manuscript and develop the procedures necessary for publishing future works. It will be used as follows: 

  • purchase an ISBN number
  • get cover art
  • cover the costs of


Risks & Challenges

Writing a novel in 48 hours is nearly impossible, but I will do my best to try. Regardless of whether I succeed or not, No matter what happens however, at the end of these 48 hours you will get whatever has been written. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Any little bit helps. Donations of a $1 will also get a copy of what I manage to write this weekend. 
  • If you cannot donate, help me out by promoting this fundraiser. I am only raising money over the course of this weekend.

story:
OddBike USA Tour Part II

In the Fall of 2013 OddBike conducted an experiment. Rather than canvas for advertising or sponsors to fund the continued development of the site I appealed directly to you, the readers and fans of OddBike, to fund a 4000 mile (6500 kms) motorcycle research trip through the Eastern United States. Your contributions, while shy of the ultimate goal, were sufficient to make the trip a reality and gave me the opportunity to gather a considerable amount of photos, stories and research material that have served me extremely well over the past two years. The experiment was a success – the readers of OddBike, through Indiegogo, directly funded the maintenance of the site and the gathering of extremely valuable material for future articles. You helped keep OddBike independent.


The Trip

Given the success of the first OddBike USA Tour in 2013 and the good feedback I received following the publication of the travelogue and related articles, I felt it was due for a sequel. Personal circumstances prevented a trip from happening in 2014, so I'm pleased to announce that the OddBike USA Tour Part II is set to happen between August 23rd and September 5th 2015.

This year’s USA Tour will be travelled along a new venue. As I currently live in Calgary, Alberta, and "Part I" saw me traverse the Eastern states, it only makes sense that this trip should be along the Western coast. An important event is needed to justify such an epic trip, so what better than a stop at the Mecca of speed and performance in North America – the Bonneville Salt Flats, arriving just in time to attend the Motorcycle Speed Trials?

The basic outline of the trip is as follows:

Approximately 4000 miles (6500 kms) overall.

A period of two weeks aboard my 2007 Aprilia Tuono, camping as often as possible to keep expenses low.

Ride from Calgary through southern British Columbia, then across the border into Washington across the Cascade Mountain Range to join the Pacific Coast Highway.

Visit Mount St Helens.

Ride the PCH through Washington, Oregon and into California

Visit the Solvang Motorcycle Museum in Solvang, CA

Visit the Mullin Automotive Museum in Oxnard, CA

Ride the Mulholland Highway and make a pilgrimage to The Rock Store in Cornell, CA

Host an OddBike meet and greet in the Los Angeles area in collaboration with fellow blogger and OddBike supporter Alicia Elfving, aka The MotoLady. 

Head north through Death Valley and ride across the Nevada desert.

Attend the Bonneville Motorcycle Speed Trials at the Bonneville Salt Flats in Utah.

Ride north through Utah, Idaho, and Montana, through the Craters of the Moon and Glacier National parks

I will be departing Sunday, August 23th, aiming to return to Calgary by Sunday, September 6th at the latest.


The Budget

Overall budget for this trip is the princely sum of 2000$ USD. In the interest of full disclosure, the funds are to be distributed as follows, padded slightly to deal with unforeseen circumstance while on the road:

400$ for fuel (estimate between 100-125 gallons, at 2.50$ a gallon average - I hope)

500$ for food (~30$/day)

700$ for accommodations (~50$/day)

400$ to cover miscellaneous expenses, gear, emergencies, and maintenance. The trip will consume a set of tires and require an oil change. I'll also need travel insurance and cell phone roaming coverage.


Why should I contribute?

Your support is more than simply paying for this trip. As on the first USA Tour, the material gathered and contacts made on this journey will contribute to OddBike’s future content. Rather than just take your money and funnel it into “site maintenance” (which, truth be told, is negligible you exclude the hundreds of hours I spend writing), I use your support to make these epic trips happen. Motorcycling is my passion and my life, and my only desire is to ride. So rather than have you pay for my work, you pay for trips like this and I keep providing the content for free, and free of advertising. You are supporting OddBike by supporting my personal motorcycling habit; I don’t ask for anything more… And I don’t ask very often.

Naturally, as on the first USA Tour, I will publish a lengthy travelogue detailing the journey and my thoughts.

No ads, no sponsors, no bullshit. OddBike is independent and always will be, and your support will keep the articles coming. With your support, I will only have to answer to one group, and the only group that matters: the readers of OddBike.


Contributors will be able to choose from a variety of little perks - small tokens of my appreciation, and visible ways you can show your support for OddBike. Be sure to include your shipping information to take advantage of these bonuses.

So I extend a sincere thank you to everyone who contributes and supports OddBike. Let’s make the USA Tour Part II a reality that will dwarf Part I in scope and content.


Other ways you can help

While camping is fun, I'm always grateful for a soft couch and a hot shower when spending long weeks on the road so if you live along the route and willing to open your home/garage to me I will be eternally grateful. Please send me an email if you can help.

I'd also be happy to meet OddBike readers along the way for a beer wherever and whenever possible, and I'm looking for suggestions for interesting stops along the way. Please email me if you have any suggestions for venues, or if you just want to say hello.

A huge thanks to everyone who contributes and shares the campaign. The support and kindness of my readers and my fans are what make all of this worthwhile.
