story:
Get your copy at a discount through this crowdfunding campaign! 

Anonymous Contribution backers will not have their names printed in the back of the books to respect their choice to be anonymous.

Disclaimer: All stories are told keeping the other parties involved anonymous. No names are used in the book and details of stories shared are vague enough to preserve anonymity.

Scroll to the bottom to read an excerpt from the book!


Have you ever wondered what goes on behind the scenes at a boudoir photo shoot? Now you'll find out! From regular gals to celebrity wives, you'll get all the drama and dirt in this tell-all by a pioneer in the field.

Over the last decade, Rachel Stephens has worked tirelessly to help modernize boudoir photography. Sought after for her camera work and natural ability to set anyone at ease so they feel safe to disrobe for her camera, she's been nicknamed "The Naked Lady Whisperer" by her loyal cult-like following. An ambassador of empowerment for women, she has been in Shape Magazine, Professional Photographer magazine, and a host of online international publications, a speaker at photography conventions, and is a CreativeLive instructor.


At the height of her success, Rachel's long, uphill battle with chronic pain from spine disease forced her to give up that vaulted career. She finds herself here, embracing each day with a never say die sass, and with your help, launching a new career as an author. What better place to start than with the stories she has collected over the last ten years while working with thousands of women in settings both sublime and surreal, that fostered tales of empowerment, moments of OH NO SHE DIDN’T, and the best of everything in between. Stories that have never been publicized, published or seen the light of day... until now.

In this hilarious and heart-warming memoir, Rachel Stephens will take us on a journey from a troubled youth to a married mother of three, living the kind of happily ever afterglow life she thought only went to good girls.

She will have you holding your sides laughing while she shares the trials and tribulations of a career that sits in a gray area of social mores.


What We Need & What You Get

Not only are you helping a book be published, you are helping a family make ends meet during Rachel's transition period from photographer to author.

    With your support, Rachel can focus on finishing this book with an editor while providing for her family, marketing and producing the book in the following formats:

    • Digital eBook, 
    • Limited edition paperback books,
    • Limited edition hard cover books,
    • Signed copies of books,
    • Audiobook.

    Limited edition means that we do not have a publisher and will be self-publishing everything ourselves so there will only be enough copies made for the backers of this campaign. The cool kids!


    Shipping

    Shipping for paperback book inside of the US is included.

    Additional shipping cost can be added to contribution at time of check out or we will contact backer directly for shipping to be collected at time of delivery.

    Shipping fees are as follows:

    $10 for hard cover book within US;
    $10 for standard international shipping of paperback book;
    $20 for standard international shipping of hard cover book.

    Expedited shipping available at backer request for an additional fee.

    If you are getting a paperback or an ebook and would like to contribute something extra towards our shipping expenses for the paperbacks, please add your contribution when checking out or just enter any amount in the contribution area above the perks.

    Thank you so much for your support!

    The Impact

    As with any crowdfunding campaign, the stakes are high. Having had a career taken from her by disability, Rachel not only lost her ability to support her family but closing her business put her full-time studio manager husband and business partner out of work.

    This is her only fall back plan.  Without your support, she will have to publish unpolished work without the guidance of a professional editor. Your support will make doing it right possible and will give her a fighting chance as a budding author.

    Risks & Challenges

    The quality of the books produced will rely on how much can be raised. Although the set the goal is low at just $7,500, we hope to raise much more so that Rachel can produce the quality book that meets her high standards as well as cover the services of a professional editor,  paying fees to Indiegogo, paying for a second retoucher to streamline the production of remaining orders from Sirens and providing the author a living wage so she can focus on nothing else but getting this book to market.

    Please share with friends and help us get people excited about bringing this book to market. There is no other book like it and no one better to tell it.

    The challenges will be in meeting projected deadlines if there are financing issues that come up in the editing and production process. All backers will receive updates at every stage of the process.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    In addition to funding this campaign at the level you are comfortable with, you can help by getting the word out on Facebook and Twitter! Please make some noise about our campaign by sharing using the Indiegogo share tools on this page! Thank you!

    Curious about her work? Click here: Rachel Stephens Photography


    EXCERPT FROM BOOK:

    With tears rimming her green eyes, she shared how she spent the last thirty years living a quiet life working as a librarian and married to a controlling man who would never look at her nude body in the light. She chronicled how she went from locked inside herself, ashamed of her body to gaining her independence from her husband and embarking upon a sexual revolution full of passion and self-discovery.

    As she spoke of her new boyfriend taking his time in bed, the light on, all hours of the day, touching her, drinking in all that she is with his eyes, her face lit up and she exhaled a long sigh, like she was letting go of something she had been holding on to for three decades. It brought tears to my eyes.

    Then the tender moment came to a jarring halt and went floppy as she
    turned to face me and said,

    “My boyfriend loves my pubic hair. Do you think we could photograph it, you know, shine the light on it and ...”

    Her voice sounded like it got pulled inside a tin can. You know how some
    people experience trauma and go outside of their body? A coping gift.

    Well, that shit never happens to me. The opposite happens to me. I get locked

    inside my body. Acutely experiencing what is happening in living color.

    Her prim posture curled forward and the anticipation that something bad
    was going to happen enveloped me like a warm embrace from someone
    that repulses you.

    No, don’t.

    Hooking her fingers into claws, she started raking her fingernails through her pubic hair with her hips jutting forward and her once soft warm eyes morphed into beady pinpoints staring right into my soul.

    Rake, rake, rake.

    “He loves my pubic hair...”

    I just stood there. I couldn’t move.

    Oh God, no. Please no. Just...just...WHY?

    Wide eyed, locked inside myself, staring, mouth gaping, searching my
    mind for some reference that would help me handle the situation. My
    makeup artist facing me standing behind this lady the same age as my
    mother going to town like she had lice in her bush, went into soundless
    convulsions laughing behind her.

    Rake, rake, rake.

    Maintain eye contact.

    Rake, rake, rake.

    Sensory overload.

    My 1,000 watt light was on, angled down towards her and her poofing
    bush was perfectly side lit glowing with terrible magnificence.

    The moment was so surreal, like a dream you are recounting and can
    remember exactly what is happening around you but not really thinking
    about what you must’ve looked like just standing there in your little
    audience of one.

    Oh, God, she’s still raking.

    It kept getting bushier.

    It was like a chia pet.

    And then like a wave of warm honey sliding over me I remember. My mind
    dials back to a point of reference and suddenly I feel comforted.

    Girl, this is not the weirdest thing you’ve seen.

    With a deep breath I put my hand in the air signaling for her to stop and
    gently say,

    “I’m sure he does however I don’t shoot that sort of thing. How about we
    do something more...implied? I think that is far sexier.”

    Her beady-eyed caricature faded back into the recesses of her personality and the sweet blushing librarian was back, smile sparkling and breasts perky in the glow
    of the tungsten light. Life was back to normal.

    Well, my normal anyway.


    *****************************************

    Go Get Your Perk so you can read more soon!
    *****************************************

    Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support!
story_txt:
Get your copy at a discount through this
crowdfunding campaign!  Anonymous
Contribution backers will not have their names printed in the back of the books to respect their choice to be anonymous.
Disclaimer: All stories are told keeping
the other parties involved anonymous. No names are used in the book and details of stories shared are vague enough to preserve anonymity.Scroll to the bottom to read an excerpt from the book!

Have you ever wondered what goes on behind the scenes
 at a boudoir photo shoot? Now you'll find out! From regular gals to 
celebrity wives, you'll get all the drama and dirt in this tell-all by a
 pioneer in the field.Over the last
decade, Rachel Stephens  has worked tirelessly to help modernize boudoir photography. Sought after for her camera work and natural
ability to set anyone at ease so they feel safe to disrobe for her camera,
she's been nicknamed "The Naked Lady Whisperer" by her loyal cult-like following. An ambassador of empowerment for women, she has been in Shape Magazine,
Professional Photographer magazine, and a host of online international publications,
a speaker at photography conventions, and is a CreativeLive instructor. 

At the height of her success, Rachel's long, uphill 
battle with chronic pain from spine disease forced her to give up that 
vaulted career. She finds herself here, embracing each day with a never 
say die sass, and with your help, launching a new career as an author. 
What better place to start than with the stories she has collected over 
the last ten years while working with thousands of women in settings 
both sublime and surreal, that fostered tales of empowerment, moments of
 OH NO SHE DIDN’T, and the best of everything in between. Stories that 
have never been publicized, published or seen the light of day... until 
now.  
In this hilarious and heart-warming memoir, Rachel 
Stephens will take us on a journey from a troubled youth to a married mother of three, living the kind of 
happily ever afterglow life she thought only went to good girls.
She will have you holding your sides laughing while she
shares the trials and tribulations of a career that sits in a gray area of
social mores. 

  What We Need & What You Get
Not only are you helping a book be published, you are helping a family make ends meet during Rachel's transition period from photographer to author. 
With your support, Rachel can focus on finishing this book with an editor while providing for her family, marketing and producing the book in the following formats:

Digital eBook, 
Limited edition paperback books,
Limited edition hard cover books,
Signed copies of books,

Audiobook.

Limited edition means that we do not have a publisher and will be self-publishing everything ourselves so there will only be enough copies made for the backers of this campaign. The cool kids!


Shipping
Shipping for paperback book inside of the US is included. Additional shipping cost can be added to contribution at time of check out or we will contact backer directly for shipping to be collected at time of delivery. Shipping fees are as follows:$10 for hard cover book within US;$10 for standard international shipping of paperback book;$20 for standard international shipping of hard cover book.Expedited shipping available at backer request for an additional fee.If you are getting a paperback or an ebook and would like to contribute something extra towards our shipping expenses for the paperbacks, please add your contribution when checking out or just enter any amount in the contribution area above the perks. Thank you so much for your support!
  The ImpactAs with any crowdfunding campaign, the stakes are high. Having had a career taken from her by disability, Rachel not only lost her ability to support her family but closing her business put her full-time studio manager husband and business partner out of work.This is her only fall back plan.  Without your support, she will have to publish unpolished work without the guidance of a professional editor. Your support will make doing it right possible and will give her a fighting chance as a budding author.
  Risks & ChallengesThe quality of the books produced will rely  on how 
much  can be raised. Although the set the goal is low at just $7,500, we
 hope to raise much more so that Rachel can produce the quality book 
that meets her high standards as well as cover the services of a 
professional editor,  paying fees 
to Indiegogo, paying for a second retoucher to streamline the production of remaining orders from Sirens and providing  the author  a living wage so she can focus on nothing else but getting this book to market. Please share with friends and help us get people excited about bringing this book to market. There is no other book like it and no one better to tell it.The challenges will be in meeting projected deadlines if there are financing issues that come up in the editing and production process. All backers will receive updates at every stage of the process.
  Other Ways You Can Help In addition to funding this campaign at the level you
 are comfortable with, you can help by getting the word out on Facebook 
and Twitter! Please make some noise about our campaign by sharing using 
the Indiegogo share tools on this page! Thank you!
Curious about her work? Click here: Rachel Stephens Photography

story:
A Russian scientist once successfully grafted the head of a small dog onto the body of a larger one. Cattle are occasionally born with two faces. A rabbit infected with Shope Papilloma Virus grows conical tumors on his face, like a real-life jackalope. Biology isn't always predictable. Sometimes it's pretty weird.

Strange Biology is a curation of these odd phenomena and more. The book has already been written, and is in the editing stage. Strange Biology also has achieved funding, so by contributing to this IndieGogo campaign, you are pre-ordering a planned book.

Why do you want this book? I am the author of the Strange Biology Blog, so you can take a look through that blog or the Strange Biology archive. If you're interested in anything freaky you'll be clicking on the different posts and calling your friends over to come see this weird horse and oh my god, how does someone make a unicorn-goat? 

The pictures on the blog are nice, but the book will be full of in-depth essays regarding these phenomena, including the science behind them and their stories and history. After backing and reading this Strange Biology project, you'll be able to tell all your friends exactly how someone makes a unicorn-goat.

Biology isn't always predictable. Sometimes it's beautiful, and inspiring, and weird and disturbing. This is a compendium of some of the most extreme animals, mutants, and mad scientists in the world of life science. Read for unpredictable, and strange, biology. 

____________________________

What are the backer rewards?

The book itself is $24. It will be approximately 100 pages. Each person who selects the $195 "Gold package" will be able to choose one more topic in the book, adding approximately 3 pages.

 All backer rewards can be seen to your right. All the bones are scavenged and cruelty-free. Also, the prices all include shipping and handling. So imagine that everything is really $10 cheaper, plus shipping.

_____________________________

What are you gonna do with all this money?

-$150 for the ISBN

-$5 to print each book

-$5-$20 per shipment

_____________________________

How does Indiegogo work?

Basically, by contributing to this campaign, you are pre-ordering a perk. The non-book related perks (skulls, jewelry, stickers) can go out as soon as you order, so it's just like buying those items at a store. Anything with a book in it requires you to wait until the book is done, of course!

Indiegogo is pretty easy, and you can pay with a credit card, Paypal, or Apple Pay. 

I am using "flex-funding," which means that there is no minimum. If one person orders a book, that one person gets it. You can keep ordering once the goal has been raised!

Also, while I have written many articles before, this is my first book. I don't know for sure how long it will take or what kind of trouble I will run into. Hopefully it will all run smoothly. I have a printing service picked out and a plan already. 

Thank you all for your time!

____________________________

Special thanks to Jen Luxton for the cover design and, should the book be funded, the layout. And to my copy editors, and anyone else who helps with the project.

Thanks to the artist and gallery, who allowed me to use the image on the cover. Photo Credit:

Brandon Ballengée

DFB 44: Pandora, 2013, Unique Iris print on Arches watercolor paper. Cleared and stained Pacific tree frog collected in Aptos, California in scientific collaboration with Stanley K. Sessions. 46 x 34 inches. Collection of Museum Het Domein, Sittard, Netherlands. Courtesy of the artist Brandon Ballengée and Ronald Feldman Fine Arts, New York

story:
Write with Me

Paix Namaste!

My name is Elle and this is my story…

The journey that unfolded in the physical world looks a lot like this:

The transformation of myself over the past ten years from an Australian Gold Coast “Barbie doll”, sixty-something-year-old-widow, living in a gated security complex enclosed with grills on all the windows and doors and now to a Bohemian Goddess, writer, artist and spiritual healer-initiator is something my mind could never have dreamed up in a million years.

To add to the outrageousness of it all, I have been in an intimate relationship with a beloved for about eight years and counting. Flying at 35,000ft above sea level, an act of providence sparked this chance meeting with a slightly-built, long-haired “old soul” - who just happens to be the same age as my son – a multi-talented “creative machine gun”: artist, photographer, designer, educator, and an eco-compassion-activist as such. My life as I knew it turned upside down, inside out, triggering bagsful of emotional turmoil, eventually resulting in profound deep healing.  

And the Inner Journey of awakening and returning to the remembrance of oneself as Soul is a whole different story. It goes:

The magical, mysterious and miraculous weaving of events that have had me dancing in God’s Grace one moment, then down on my knees in gut-wrenching agony in another, when ego shows up, is all part of an exquisite tapestry revealing itself thread by colourful thread.

I would love to share the interweaving of both journeys through my writing.

The serendipitous chain of events that led me to an ashram in Bali where I lived for seven years in a grass-roofed villa on the side of a gorge; totally open to the jungle below; the bed netting being my only security.

Moving to the Philippines in 2013, I call a tree house home for a period of two months – a far cry from the security grills and locks I imprisoned myself with in Australia.

Some of these experiences are written as short blog articles with beautiful photographic images on my web site: www.elledivine.com 

With the monsoon season just beginning, I am making a commitment to fully support the creative muse that is now screaming at me to write – right, yes, write, write, write. With the temperature of the air a lot cooler, the overcast sky gentle on my eyes, and the soothing sound of the rain, I feel the time is ripe for me to channel through words of wisdom and laughter and joy and sadness and ecstasy.

The three-month writing residency project, Monsoon Writing, will be self-directed (with support from fellow writers) and crowd-funded to intensify the motivation and discipline to focus into writing.

If there is an inquisitiveness arising within you to know how this journey unfolds and the simple healing techniques I have acquired to move from fear to love; from darkness to light; from merely existing in this world to truly living a happy peace filled life, please take a look at the options available for you to consider in supporting this project. By doing so you will not only be helping fund the Monsoon Writing Project but energetically you will be supporting yourself also; your own Soul’s journey to awakening, whatever that is for you. And that is just how this loving universe works.

The available energy-exchange or rewards for sponsors will be in the forms of original artworks; or art greeting cards and a pouch of "Ancient Wisdom" inspirational cards designed and handmade in our studio; or an e-book copy of the completed work. And of course a personal “thank you” note (and a mention in my website) and virtual hug-and-kisses.

"Write here; there's no other place. Write now; there's no other time."

Got time to sit down with me for tea or coffee? I'll read you a short story "Seagull: The Key that Found Me". Click here: http://elledivine.com/2014/07/24/seagull-the-ke... 

Have you heard of Pecha Kucha, let me share my presentation with you. Click here: http://elledivine.com/2014/09/10/heart-of-healing-a-pecha-kucha-experience-2/

Our tree house living, click here: http://elledivine.com/2014/07/15/living-anew/


A Cycle of Giving and Receiving

The collective fund will support the basic needs while living in the country – including food, visa, and accommodation. Excess fund will be utilized for editing  and publishing fees for the next phase. 

Summary of energy exchange/rewards:
  • Original artworks are up for grabs   
  • Art greetings cards and/or pouch of "Ancient Wisdom" Inspirational cards 
  • E-book or book copy of the completed work
  • Acknowledgment in the book and on my website
  • A chant of blessings for you
Own this painting! “Sherara: Awakening Divine Feminine” is a visual expression directed by heartfelt trust to the Divine Muse to render the palpable creative flow manifesting many Light Beings to birth forth from the dim of the ‘world of illusion’. Sherara, an Aramaic word meaning “Truth”, is an energy frequency that guides my visions – that helps solidify, crystallize, and ground my Being. In the whirling dance of light and darkness, when we fully trust the “Truth” to set us free from the bondage of complexity, only the simple words of Love can quench our thirst to fulfill our desire to be at peace with our Creator.


Multiplying Happiness
The impact to multiply happiness is a worthwhile endeavor:
  • By giving your contribution, you fuel the mission to complete the work and manifest a book of healing and awakening that will be instrumental as a "shaker and mover" for others to live life to the fullest
  • "Happiness is beautiful when shared." I believe in this quote. Our previous project was to silkscreen and hand-paint 200 t-shirts for children sponsored by good-hearted friends. We then gifted it to community children in Tacloban - the ground zero of Typhoon Haiyan disaster. The message of hope and faith printed on the shirts are testaments that "Love shines!"
  • This is our work together. You will be part of a creative mission. Join and write with me.
Read blog "Multiplying Happiness" and view images here: http://elledivine.com/2014/12/20/multiplication...


Risks & Challenges

The challenge is to complete the work within the time frame and all rewards sent out as stated. I will send regular updates with all the backers via email and journal notes in my website.  

  • With the coolness of the monsoon, perhaps the greatest challenge is when the muse wakes me up in the early morning hour and the body just wants to cuddle in bed. Write, Elle. Write. Write. Write. Hehehehe. 
  • I'm setting a writing schedule to follow with a bit of flexibility. 


Resourcefulness is a Means

For this project, financial means will help fuel the momentum. Although, if you feel that your help will be of other means, please do so. Good-spirited blessing is also welcome.

  • You can also help make some noise (loving noise that is) to promote this project within your network
  • Sharing this through email to 5 of your best buddies will help multiply the ripple. Invite them to multiply it as well with your great recommendation.

And that's all there is to it. Alohabwoonnnn! 

Blessings,

Elle Divine (a.k.a. Lorraine Wood) 


Gallery: Selection of Artworks

Take time to tour the gallery of my paintings. Click here for more: http://elledivine.com/gallery/

A Cycle of Giving and Receiving

while living in the country – including food, visa, and accommodation. Excess
fund will be utilized for editing  and publishing fees for the next phase. 
Summary of energy exchange/rewards:

Original artworks are up for grabs    Art greetings cards and/or pouch of "Ancient Wisdom" Inspirational cards  E-book or book copy of the completed work
Acknowledgment in the book and on my website
A chant of blessings for you

Own this painting! “Sherara: Awakening Divine Feminine” is a visual expression directed by heartfelt trust to the Divine Muse to render the palpable creative flow manifesting many Light Beings to birth forth from the dim of the ‘world of illusion’. Sherara, an Aramaic word meaning “Truth”, is an energy frequency that guides my visions – that helps solidify, crystallize, and ground my Being. In the whirling dance of light and darkness, when we fully trust the “Truth” to set us free from the bondage of complexity, only the simple words of Love can quench our thirst to fulfill our desire to be at peace with our Creator.



Multiplying Happiness

The impact to multiply happiness is a worthwhile endeavor:

  By giving your contribution, you fuel the mission to complete the work and manifest a book of healing and awakening that will be instrumental as a "shaker and mover" for others to live life to the fullest "Happiness is beautiful when shared." I believe in this quote. Our previous project was to silkscreen and hand-paint 200 t-shirts for children sponsored by good-hearted friends. We then gifted it to community children in Tacloban - the ground zero of Typhoon Haiyan disaster. The message of hope and faith printed on the shirts are testaments that "Love shines!" This is our work together. You will be part of a creative mission. Join and write with me.

Read blog "Multiplying Happiness" and view images here: http://elledivine.com/2014/12/20/multiplication...




Risks & Challenges

  The challenge is to complete the work within the
time frame and all rewards sent out as stated. I will send regular updates with
all the backers via email and journal notes in my website.    With the coolness of the monsoon, perhaps the greatest challenge is when the muse wakes me up in the early morning hour and the body just wants to cuddle in bed. Write, Elle. Write. Write. Write. Hehehehe.  I'm setting a writing schedule to follow with a bit of flexibility.     
Resourcefulness is a Means For this project, financial means will help fuel the momentum. Although, if you feel that your help will be of other means, please do so. Good-spirited blessing is also welcome.  You can also help make some noise (loving noise that is) to promote this project within your network Sharing this through email to 5 of your best buddies will help multiply the ripple. Invite them to multiply it as well with your great recommendation.   And that's all there is to it. Alohabwoonnnn! Blessings,Elle Divine (a.k.a. Lorraine Wood) 
Gallery: Selection of Artworks

Take time to tour the gallery of my paintings. Click here for more: http://elledivine.com/gallery/

story:
For those of you who already know her, you know that Tara Skurtu is the real deal. She's genuine, kind, funny, generous, caring, dedicated, hard-working, and, above all, incredibly talented. 

Tara's year is off to a great start already -- she was a May 2015 Poetry on the T Contest Winner with her poem "Anyone's Son," her poem "Derivatives" was published in the Tahoma Literary Review, and she has new work forthcoming in Plume and The Kenyon Review. She's definitely going places -- in fact, she's going to Romania!

Tara was awarded a Fulbright scholarship to spend the 2015-16 academic year at the University of Transylvania in Brașov teaching English. Outside the classroom, she'll hold creative writing and translation workshops for youth, aspiring writers, and English language learners in the literary community. She'll also be continuing her own writing, completing the manuscript for her first book of poetry, and translating Romanian poetry. In September, Tara will be reading her work at the 2015 International Poetry Festival in Sibiu, Romania, as she has done for the past two years. Tara is passionate about language and poetry, as well as sharing her love of these things through teaching.

So, let's give Tara the send off she deserves! This is your chance to celebrate both Tara and the work that she loves by helping support her while she's in Romania this year. Tara is leaving her full-time position and apartment in Boston in order to pursue this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. The Fulbright award does provide a modest stipend for her teaching duties, of course, but will not cover all of her expenses for the year or the costs associated with her re-entry back to the U.S. Our aim is to lessen her financial concerns to make sure she can have the most productive and enriching experience in Romania.

Any amount you can give will be greatly appreciated, but do consider making a contribution soon to nab one of the TRULY UNIQUE, hand-made "limited edition" perks from Tara!

For more information about Tara and her work, go to her website at http://taraskurtu.com or follow her on Twitter at https://twitter.com/TaraSkurtu.

story:
Beloved Magazine is lifestyle magazine written by and for young women. We want to move away idealism and perfection, and instead meet women where they're are at. We want to use real, honest words, ideas, and pictures to illustrate this. We can speak clearly to the problems and desires of a young woman's ever-changing life, because the contributors of this magazine are also young women. Something that sets Beloved apart from other magazines is that each section of the magazine has a mentor - a woman that has understanding and experience on the subject matter. Our goal is to create an intersection between struggle and wisdom. 

Our team is equipped with a wide spectrum of skills, interests, and experiences, all necessary for the production of this magazine. This idea came from a light-hearted conversation between two friends discussing what we were doing after we graduated. The idea struck a chord with each friend I told about Beloved. It began to gain momentum without much effort, and suddenly 5 friends turned to 10, 10 to 20, and now we have around 50 women of many backgrounds and experiences that contribute.  Beloved is also a platform for local businesses and artisans to be seen and recognized, so we sell our advertising space and aim to host events with local people.

Since the beginning we have dreamed of printing Beloved, but we have only been able to digitally produce it. With your support on IndieGoGo, we will use this money to fund the price of printing and shipping our Gather issue. For our particular layout will cost at least $5,000. We want to cover half the price of printing the next issue as well so we don't have to do another fundraising campaign in the next 6 months. We will also be buying business tools like Quickbooks, Photoshop, and InDesign to get us off our feet. We desperately want to be a sustainable business, and we can't do that with no money to start with, unfortunately.

story:
Short Summary

I am the author of six previous books: Mal Occhio: The Underside of Vision (North Point Press: 1981), Dream Streets:The Big Book of Italian American Culture (Harper & Row: 1989), and Una Storia Segreta: The Secret History of Italian American Evacuation and Internment During World War II (Heyday Books: 2001), with both Mal Occhio and the Big Book now under my own Sanniti Publications imprint. Also under the Sanniti imprint are: Esty: A Novel/Memoir (Sanniti: 2008); Branded: How Italian Immigrants Became ‘Enemies’ During WWII (Sanniti: 2015) and Earth Breath: Selected Blogs, 2009-2016 (Sanniti: 2016).   

Serious fiction of the kind I am interested in is an endangered species. It is for this reason that I started my own imprint in the first place, and that I am now publishing another novel, this time dramatizing  a love story during the dark days when 600,00 Italian enemy aliens were under U.S. government restriction. It is a story about star-crossed lovers that I believe will have timeless appeal for many many readers.  

By joining in this effort, you can help me to mitigate some of the risk, while acting as the book’s primary readers, supporters and publicizers.

What We Need & What You Get

In times past, book publishers often relied on “angels,” wealthy donors who wanted to associate with the gentile world of publishing. Now you, as a lover of literature, can become an “angel” for this book—helping to get Suspect Love into print and the little-known story about the Italian ordeal during WWII into the hands of hundreds, perhaps thousands of readers.

   I have the book designed and it’s ready to be printed. For a modest initial print run, and a little attendant publicity, I figure I need about $1500.00 to begin with.

   Here’s how you can help. For a donation of $50., you get an autographed copy of the book without charge. For $100., you get two autographed copies (give them as gifts). All those who give $150. and up will receive the two copies and be mentioned in print on the book's Acknowledgments page. Beyond that, a $150 donor will be acknowledged in print as a Sponsor, a $200 donor as a Patron, and for $300, you will be thanked as an Angel. Please note that in order to be acknowledged in the printed book, the donation must be received before we go to press on April 1. If there is a second or third printing, we should be able to acknowledge donors who miss this initial deadline. 

The Impact

This is my fourth Indiegogo campaign, all to produce books via my Sanniti Publications imprint. All have been successful, thanks to contributors like you, and I'm hoping you'll be able to help with this one as well. 

I have been working on Suspect Love for over ten years and finally have it the way I want it. My intention to write a novel featuring the conflict in the San Francisco Italian community during the war years occurred to me almost as soon as I heard about the story, now known as Una Storia Segreta. Sadly, that story is still a secret to most Americans, and treating it in fiction for a wide audience is one way to make it better known. If the story were to make it into film, its impact would be multiplied many thousands of times. 

Since I'm well-known now for my work on Una Storia Segreta, my hope is that this book will find an already-sympathetic audience to help extend its influence far and wide. You can be a part of this project by supporting Suspect Love in its early stages. 

Risks & Challenges

As  noted above, book publishing, particularly of serious fiction, has become a high-risk business. Still, there is a particular market for any book that dramatizes little-known histories like this one: the restrictions and internments of Italian immigrants during World War II. By telling the story  of a love affair between two young people on opposite sides of the political divide, key truths of this story--dramatic, emotional--can be conveyed in a way unavailable to historical renderings . My reputation, established via my previous books in this area, should make this all the more possible. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Everyone understands that money is tight these days. But even if you can’t contribute monetarily, you can still help get the word out. Indiegogo has share tools that allow you to spread the word on the web via social media. Personally, you can tell your friends about the book, and about this campaign. Suggest Suspect Love as a great gift book; request it at your local library. Every bit of help, no matter its size or reach, will be deeply appreciated.

story:
THE BOOK

Hi, I’m Linda Johnson-Bell from TheWineLady.com and I have been a wine critic, author, competition judge, journalist and drinker (!) for over 20 years. My wine training began in France, where I lived and studied for 10 years and was the Editor of Vintage International Magazine in Paris. Over the past decade, as I noticed my favourite wines changing in taste, I have become more specialised in wine and climate change and cool-climate viticulture, which prompted me to found TWACCI, The Wine and Climate Change Institute in Oxford, England. This will be my first self-published book, and I am campaigning to raise funds to continue my research, to produce and to market BLIND DRUNK.

The topic of BLIND DRUNK is: Wine, or water? This is because this is the choice that the world’s winemakers are currently facing as our most well-loved wine regions across the globe shrivel with heat and drought. Did you know that the Water Footprint Network states that it takes 5 litres of freshwater to make a glass of wine without irrigation as opposed to 150 – 350 + litres in irrigated regions, depending on rainfall and heat?

People are starting to ask questions: Will we run out of wine? (See my most recent SKY NEWS Interview on global wine shortage)  If I can’t irrigate, what do I do? Will wine prices rise or fall? Will the wine in the future be better, worse, or just different? My friends are always asking me why their favourite wines are changing in taste and price, and why alcohol levels are so high, or why so many wines are starting to taste the same.

BLIND DRUNK will answer all of this and more and set the stage for a new drinking trend. Because now, more than ever, before there can be “organic”, “sustainable”, or “biodynamic”, there has to be “rain fed”, or dry farmed, which is the method of preparing the soil to maximise the moisture of winter rainfall to sustain the vines during their growing season. Because as things stand now, we are losing our classic wine regions for ever.  The well has run dry. Can we really afford to continue to use our scarce freshwater supplies to irrigate a luxury crop?

BLIND DRUNK will have the first RAINFED REGISTRY to help you make more responsible drinking choices. There will be interviews and I’ll follow the lives of several produces across the globe as they transition and find their way in their new climates. BLIND DRUNK will explain why “good” wine does not mean expensive, will include lots of buying tips, reveal all of the new exciting wine regions, explain what is behind all of the trends like “biodynamic”, how and what to really invest in.

THE IMPACT

Why is this important? Wine grapes represent a $300+ billion global industry and are the most valuable fruit crop in the world. Wine is climatologists’ “canary in the coal mine” because it’s the fruit crop the most susceptible to changes in climate. So much so, that scientists have determined that the area suitable for wine production will have shrunk by up to 75% by 2050. In BLIND DRUNK, I will explain why the best way to save both our wine and water supplies, and to ensure that we have quality wines in the future, is to make dry-farming the global industry standard. We are getting dangerously close to having to choose between LOW YIELDS OR NO YIELDS.

When there are farmers in South Australia committing suicide because the water licenses go to the grape farmers who are selling their diluted Chardonnay to bulk brands, the world needs to know. You need to know what’s happening in the vineyards – it is not a niche topic. The drama unfolding today  effects the drink retail sector, the travel and tourism industries, environmentalists, historians, consumers, biologists, the investment markets, and dozens of other satellite sectors.

Your contribution to BLIND DRUNK will help establish consumer awareness and create an environment in which wine producers can make the changes they are faced with. Because the grape farmers who are not poised to transition to dry farming, will be caught out with the brutal choice of diversifying, migrating, or ceasing viticulture entirely. This is no easy matter. It is easy to move a wheat field, but how does a 500 year-old vineyard with its chateau, family history and branding, change crops and make something else - or move?? The world’s Wine Map is changing and you can help shape its destination.

THE PERKS!

Apart from signed copies of previous books as well as this one, BLIND DRUNK, I'll be offering bespoke wine and food concierge services, SKYPE wine lessons, cellar planning (buying guides), Press Tastings in London, and vineyard tours in our 1952 Buick convertible. 

THE FUNDING

This will be the first book that I self-publish and I am very excited. Please feel free to visit my Amazon Author Page. I want to do it properly. Funds raised through your assistance will assist in further research, production and the marketing of BLIND DRUNK. I will use the funds for further research trips, wine producer survey costs, book cover illustration, manuscript editor, printing, ISBN and other legal costs, author copies, Press Launch, PR campaign and miscellaneous office costs. Please feel free to ask about more details. 

HELPFUL LINKS

www.thewinelady.com

www.twacci.org

Amazon Author Page

The Wine Lady's You Tube Channel

INSTAGRAM

LINKEDIN

TWITTER

story:
The Supernatural Wiki is a compendium of knowledge about Supernatural and our fandom.  We also will be expanding to cover Wayward Sisters when (hopefully) it airs! 

The Supernatural Wiki is a resource used by both fandom and the people who work on making Supernatural, with over four million visitors a year. There are over 3,500 entries on Winchesters and werewolves, angels and demons, music and mythology, 'ships and shapeshifters, fanfiction, fanart and folklore, the cast and crew, conventions and more.  It is the only online repository of a complete set of transcripts of the series. A veritable encyclopedia of weirdness!

Any fan can contribute to the site and that is why the SuperWiki is just as incredibly erudite, diverse and quirky as the fandom that creates it. We support fans in learning how to code on the Wiki, create and edit entries or in hosting their own projects on the site.

The SupernaturalWiki is supported by our awesome @SuperWiki on Twitter, and you can find us on Tumblr  and Instagram too!

We want to give you a super-charged, extra awesome Supernatural Wiki that will be here until the end of days!  100% of the money we raise here goes directly into the costs of hosting and maintaining the site.

The Supernatural Wiki is a not-for-profit fandom project. We have always been ad-free and independent – run by fans for fans.  

Two years ago fandom raised  $6,000  for the SupernaturalWiki  and that money has covered our costs since that time.

Our budget for the next two years includes leasing a  server and paying IT support for upgrades, maintaining backup and security systems, and trouble-shooting issues such as spam attacks. The SuperWiki is a big site - in terms of content and the traffic we get - and so that means we need a dedicated server that can cope with that, as well as 24/7 IT support.

Our immediate project is to move to a new server. We've shopped around and will be moving to a server that will optimize performance, and is cheaper than our current one.  We will also get an upgrade of the MediaWiki software and improve our security.

ITEM

COST (USD)

Lease of dedicated server            

$1,200 p.a.= $2,400

IT support

$1,500 p.a.= $3,000

Indiegogo and transaction fees

$510

TOTAL:

$5,910

You will get a shoutout and a follow on Twitter (and/or Tumblr or IG) by @SuperWiki (if you like - I will confirm this with you via email unless you pick "no perks"), and a listing on the front page of the SupernaturalWiki for higher donations. The top tiers can pick an entry they would like to see on the SuperWiki and we'll build it for you.  

We have decided not to provide other gifts for people donating, as we want all of the money raised to go to the SuperWiki, and not on buying and mailing rewards.

There will be a great plague released upon the Earth!!!    We will use whatever funds are raised to support the Supernatural Wiki.  Then we will try alternative fundraising strategies such as selling t-shirts, hustling pool and dark magic.
story_txt:
The Supernatural Wiki is a compendium of knowledge about Supernatural and our fandom.  We also will be expanding to cover Wayward Sisters when (hopefully) it airs! 
The Supernatural Wiki is a resource used by both fandom and the people who work on making Supernatural, with over four million visitors a year. There are over 3,500 entries on Winchesters and werewolves, angels and demons, music and mythology, 'ships and shapeshifters, fanfiction, fanart and folklore, the cast and crew, conventions and more.  It is the only online repository of a complete set of transcripts of the series. A veritable encyclopedia of weirdness!
Any fan can contribute to the site and that is why the SuperWiki is just as incredibly erudite, diverse and quirky as the fandom that creates it. We support fans in learning how to code on the Wiki, create and edit entries or in hosting their own projects on the site.
The SupernaturalWiki is supported by our awesome @SuperWiki on Twitter, and you can find us on Tumblr  and Instagram too!

We want to give you a super-charged, extra awesome Supernatural Wiki that will be here until the end of days!  100% of the money we raise here goes directly into the costs of hosting and maintaining the site.
The Supernatural Wiki is a not-for-profit fandom project. We have always been ad-free and independent – run by fans for fans.  
Two years ago fandom raised  $6,000  for the SupernaturalWiki  and that money has covered our costs since that time.

Our budget for the next two years includes leasing a  server and paying IT support for upgrades, maintaining backup and security systems, and trouble-shooting issues such as spam attacks. The SuperWiki is a big site - in terms of content and the traffic we get - and so that means we need a dedicated server that can cope with that, as well as 24/7 IT support.
Our immediate project is to move to a new server. We've shopped around and will be moving to a server that will optimize performance, and is cheaper than our current one.  We will also get an upgrade of the MediaWiki software and improve our security.


ITEM
COST (USD)


Lease of dedicated server            
$1,200 p.a.= $2,400


IT support
$1,500 p.a.= $3,000


Indiegogo and transaction fees
$510


TOTAL:
$5,910



You will get a shoutout and a follow on Twitter (and/or Tumblr or IG) by @SuperWiki (if you like - I will confirm this with you via email unless you pick "no perks"), and a listing on the front page of the SupernaturalWiki for higher donations. The top tiers can pick an entry they would like to see on the SuperWiki and we'll build it for you.  
We have decided not to provide other gifts for people donating, as we want all of the money raised to go to the SuperWiki, and not on buying and mailing rewards.

There will be a great plague released upon the Earth!!!    We will use whatever funds are raised to support the Supernatural Wiki.  Then we will try alternative fundraising strategies such as selling t-shirts, hustling pool and dark magic.

story:
Short Summary

"Set sometime pre the Industrial Revolution, Old Silence, the long-time village sweeper, becomes disillusioned with his vocation after a casual encounter with some of the village children. Whilst the old sweeper retreats to his bed and sinks into a deep melancholy, the village slowly becomes choked with dust. But when the village children realise what needs to be done to save the village they take matters into their own hands, awakening the sweeper from his slump and together they bring the village back to life..."

Several years ago whilst I was teaching at my local remote Goongerah Primary school in Far East Gippsland I wrote 'The Sweeper'. This story just flowed out of me in real time during a literacy lesson. I typed the story onto the Smartboard whilst the kids were working on their own creative writing projects. We then shared our stories. It was inspired modelling on my behalf! Fast forward & after many people suggested I should turn it into a picture book I engaged Aviva Reed to do the illustrations. Once the illustrations were completed I engaged a graphic artist to do the lay out. The investment for this project to date has been $6000 out of my own pocket, as well as several years to get it from idea to print ready. I was certain that the book would be snapped up by a publishing house and sell many copies, so I set out pitching the book to publishers and literary agents, but to my great surprise & dismay nobody offered to publish The Sweeper.

I now see this as an opportunity to self publish under my own boutique Bowler Hat Publishing label with the support of you all, and have a lot more control over my creative endeavours. I believe The Sweeper is good enough to be a Short Listed picture book, so let's make this happen!

 

What We Need & What You Get

My goal is to do an initial print run of 500 books to get things rolling. Initially Paradigm Print in Queensland will do the first run.

500 books printed  AUD$2,500

Postage and handling AUD $1,500

Other costs AUD $1000 (including recouping some of my initial $6,000 investment)

My main goal is that the book gets published! This will allow me to start selling it through a variety of marketing strategies to recoup my initial investment, and go from there. These include, doing readings at Primary schools and libraries where I will be able to meet and engage with my audience, as well as sell books and do other cross-promotional activities including connecting folk with Zucchini Clan & E3 musiQ. I also plan to do a solo performance of The Sweeper, including making the music for this production.

The Impact

My project is valuable as it is a wholly independent creative endeavour which will allow me to gain some control over my financial future. Too often creative folk struggle financially, and getting Bowler Hat Publishing up and running will enable me to work on creating a financially sustainable enterprise.

It is also worthy because my philosophy is to publish books of quality with a positive message, collaborating with various artists and building a credible brand that financially supports both the writer and illustrator.

I have a successful track record with the family friendly band I co-created, Zucchini Clan. Madeline and I have put a lot of time, money and hard work into building Zucchini Clan as a unique, family friendly entertainment enterprise with fantastic music and positive messages. Our upcoming release 'Heirloom Mix' will help us take the next step into growing our profile and brand.

I am also emerging electronic music producer E3 (Esquir3). You can check out my original, expansive electronica and follow me here: soundcloud.com/esquir3

I have always been motivated to make a positive difference and expressing my own unique artistic vision. I believe that providing quality music, literature and engaging experiences really helps kids develop into confident, creative, well adjusted people. A great picture book will stand the test of time, and be an enjoyable read not only for kids, but adults too!

Risks & Challenges

Just starting this project and putting my money where my heart is was risky, but such knock-backs have created the opportunity for me to take control of my own destiny and self publish. We only have to look at Dr Seuss (who I share the birth-date of March 2 with) to see how often publishers get it wrong. His first book, 'And to Think That I Saw It on Mulberry Street' was initially rejected 27 times before being published, and it wasn't until 'The Cat in the Hat' 20 years later in 1957 that he became a household name. So publishers, like record labels, often get things wrong. Keeping this in mind has inspired me to move on and I am determined to get 'The Sweeper' published and distributed into the global marketplace. Once published, I will put in the next lot of hard yards in hitting the street to market the book and my Bowler Hat vision as I have several other stories I have written just waiting for the right illustrators. If you are one, hit me up please!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

One can have the best product/service in the world, but if no-one knows about it, its potential can never be realized. I believe that every household with Primary school aged kids should have a copy of 'The Sweeper', so just letting your family/friends with kids know about the book, or better still, buying a copy as a gift helps so much. Books, like songs, are their own best advertisements, and word-of-mouth is always the best promotion.
 
Also, if you have kids in a Primary school and would like me to come and do a reading and Q&A with the kids, let the school know, and get the ball rolling. This especially would be a fantastic help in making this a financially viable venture. And as everyone knows, it's very challenging to make a living as a creative in Australia without support.

story:
Short Summary

My name is David D. Simons and I used to live a life of purposelessness. I grew up in a great home, with awesome parents, and an amazing family yet I still managed to spend a lot of my youth and young adult years living aimlessly. I am on a mission to remove purposelessness because I saw the affect it had on me. I wasn’t a stupid kid but I barely graduated 8th grade. In my junior year of high school I cracked into the system and changed my grades in one of my classes and I was expelled from my high school and also the entire school district. I was told in high school that I was most likely to end up in jail, and unfortunately they were right. I disappointed my family, my community and myself. If that wasn’t enough a few days after turning 18 I was hanging out with the wrong people and I went to cash a check at a bank not knowing the check was stolen. I was told that what I did was a felony and since I just turned 18 I was going to do 6 years in prison at a minimum for what I did.

Thank God for prayers, family, the $10,000 dollars in bail money my mom paid, and an accidental error of me not signing the back of the check. Thankfully I did not end up going to prison. Although I escaped prison, I was still a prisoner to a life of purposelessness, I partied, smoked a lot of weed, and got into more trouble while in college. It wasn’t until a life changing encounter that caused me turned my life around and shortly thereafter I discovered my gifts, my purpose, and who I was meant to be.

Today I run a successful digital marketing agency that helps influential leaders and leading organizations to leverage social media to grow their brands, increase income, and build authority. We also provide world class social media training. The same kid who was told he would end up being a sanitation engineer has now worked alongside Fortune 500 companies Kraft, Frito Lay, Huggies, leading non-profits, NFL players, NBA players churches, Government organizations The Department of Defense, and world renown speakers and entrepreneurs. My work has been featured by Entrepreneur, CBS, ABC, Hootsuite, Yahoo, Dell, featured on TV, a front of a magazine and many other publications.

I was also fortunate to also obtain a degree in Digital Media from Sacramento State University, and a Masters degree in Entertainment Business from Full Sail University.

 The same kid who did poorly in school is now an adjunct professor teaching people how to maximize social media. Today I live in West Philadelphia with my loving wife Abigail Simons.

I am definitely not where I want to be yet however I am far from who I used to be and what most people expected of me. I want the same result for every person who has felt their life lacked purpose and unused potential.

What We Need & What You Get

Here is what we need:

  • To print our first 1,000 books will cost $3,500
  • To get the book graphics designed will cost us $300
  • To get the book turned into audio book to make it easier for young people to absorb the material will cost about $200 for every finished hour and the book should take about 6 hours making it $1200
  • High quality editing and proof reading will cost $1800
  • Marketing costs to get sponsors who will purchase the books to give to kids in the lowest performing schools in Philadelphia as well as books to give to the youth connected to The Nehemiah Davis Foundation. This will cost us about $2,000.
  • Costs for rewards $900
  • Fees to Indiegogo (10%) 1,000
  • Bringing us to a total of $10,000 (The $10,000 dollars is significant because $10,000 is the amount the bail was set for my crime)

With your help we can do this!

If we don’t reach our goal we will spend what receive on getting books printed the book should be out by November 2018.

  • Everyone who donates $1- $10 will get an ebook 10 
  • If you donate $10 - $20 You will get an ebook
  • If you donate $20 - $30 You will get the ebook and the paperback version
  • If you donate $30 - $50 You will get ebook, the audio book and the paperback
  • If you donate $50 - $100 You will get the signed book and the others 
  • If you donate $100+ You will get a To shirt and the other bundle
  • If you donate $200 The Others place a thank you in the beginning of the book
  • If you donate $300 I will send you the others plus an authentic cheesesteak mailed from my favorite cheesesteak place, Jim’s 
  • If you donate $400 I will send you 4 authentic cheesesteaks from my favorite place Jim's
  • If you donate $500 Featured in the press release for the book
  • If you donate $1,000 Picture Featured in the back of the book
  • If you donate $2,500 You will get a page in the back of the book
  • If you donate $5,000 Featured on a section of the audiobook and producer credit and featured in the back section of the book
  • If you donate $10,000 The book will be dedicated to you

The Impact

My aim is to help as many young people, young adults, and even adults who are struggling with the reason for their existence and have no clue at what they are meant to do. Today I live a life of purpose and the major reason why that is so is because I know the clues that lead one to discover themselves and find their God given gifts and abilities that are sometimes difficult to see especially when you are in your own way. I want to help as many young people as I can to find and discover their unique gifts and talents faster and quicker than I did. I want them to avoid spending their youth aimlessly because that time is precious and you can never ever get it back. I want to help young adults who have made their mistakes and do not see the treasures that are within them because their minds are clouded with their failures and disappointments. 

I know what’s it like to be a failure, I know what it’s like to have a life but not know the reason for your life, I have experienced some of life’s toughest challenges and the one thing that has been able to help me persevere through it all is knowing my distinct and unique purpose.

Your contribution will aid in helping young people find their gifts, and identify their purpose at a much earlier age in life. This will reduce the amount of crime, hatred, suicide, deaths, poverty, and so much more from our world. You are not just helping to get a book out there, you are stirring up a movement to change societies, cultures, and transform generations. Mark Twain said, there are two important days in ones life. One is the day you are born, and the other is the day you figure out why. Help us to help people learn why they are here.

Risks & Challenges

The only major or risk or challenge we could foresee is not having the book published by our November 2018 goal. We will strive hard to have the goal met and have all the perks and rewards sent out by January 2019.

The bulk of our funding needs are for printing the book and getting the audio version professionally recorded. We will be transparent with you as much as possible - if there are any issues during the production process, we will make it our responsibility to update you in a timely manner.

In the case that shipping gets lost, we will replace the items in your order for you at no additional cost.

Other Ways You Can Help

Money is not the only type of contribution we value. If you can share on your social media networks, text some of your friends and family, or do an email blast letting people know about what we are doing, that would be much appreciated. 

There are a lot easy share tools right on our Indiegogo page, so please feel free to share.

Thank you for help us to fight PURPOSELESSNESS!

story:
Become part of »Bauhinia Rhapsody« and help me publish my debut novel

Postanite del letošnjega koktajla potovalnih avantur in mi pomagajte izdati moj knjižni prvenec

I’m Janine Coel (www.janinecoel.com), and I've written »Bauhinia Rhapsody: Adventures in Hong Kong«, a multicultural novel packed with travel discoveries, which brings readers inside one of Asia’s top destinations. I’ve worked on this project for two years, and now I’m proud to take the next step. 

Sem Slovenka, v literarnem svetu predstavljena kot Janine Coel, in sem pravkar napisala »Bauhinia Rhapsody: Adventures in Hong Kong«, roman, ki popelje bralca v eno izmed najbolj privlačnih destinacij v Aziji. Zgodba govori o Slovenki na Kitajskem in je polna potovalnih avantur, novih spoznanj in spodletelih romantičnih trikov. 

Official Teaser Trailer 

‘‘Hong Kong is about to welcome the quirkiest bunch in the history of student exchange programs: Walt is obsessed with becoming the President of the United States, Tatie with winning an Oscar for best original screenplay, Vivian with moving into the White House alongside Walt, while Ruby, once again, confirms her existence as the greatest sidekick that ever lived." 

BAUHINIA RHAPSODY is a multicultural novel and tells the story of Tatie, an eighteen-year-old dreamer girl who yearns for the martial hero China as seen in the movies, but when she comes to Hong Kong for her studies and to find inspiration for the martial arts play she is writing, she realizes that the world is not as it is shown on television. 

She is soon courted by WALT, an ambitious Texan from an influential family, who already has big plans to conquer the White House. After two disastrous dates, she finds comfort and the brother she should’ve had but never did in CHARLIE, a vivacious backpacker. Being a retired martial artist himself, he offers to write the fight scenes for her play and inspires her to follow her heart, not her pension. 

However, she discovers a stronger-than-expected relationship between Walt and VIVIAN who is obsessed with gaining the Southerner's attention and—to Tatie's misfortune—already behaves and dresses as if she were the next Secretary of State. The two seem to have everything in common, and they are flying to Beijing the same weekend, which is unacceptable. Tatie is not alone: RUBY WU is her closest friend, invaluable in her role as guide, interpreter, and consoler, and together they set off on an adventure to track down Walt and Vivian. On the coldest and foggiest weekend in the history of sightseeing.

You are welcome to contact me through my website www.janinecoel.com or directly janinecoel@gmail.com if you have any questions regarding the project. 

Če imate kakršnokoli vprašanje v zvezi s knjigo, kampanjo ali projektom nasploh, ste dobrodošli, da me kontaktirajte preko spletne strani ali janinecoel@gmail.com

Pripeljimo Slovenijo skupaj do večje prepoznavnosti

Slovenski atributi in teme, ki sem jih vključila v roman:

- glavna junakinja Tatjana oz. Tatie in njena zdrava slovenska podeželska pamet, ki se na vsakem koraku na zabaven način prekriža s teksaško in kitajsko

- začetek romana v središču Ljubljane: Prešernov spomenik, recitiranje dela Zdravljice, Zmajski most, Ljubljanica

- kurentovanje

- potica

- petje pesmi Sreča na Vrvici

O čem govori roman?

”Hong Kong bo kmalu gostil najbolj nenavadno skupino v zgodovini študentskih izmenjav: Walt je obseden s tem, da postane predsednik ZDA, Tatie z osvojitvijo Oskarja za najboljši izvirni scenarij, Vivian s tem, da se vseli v Belo Hišo poleg Walta, medtem ko Ruby znova potrdi svoj obstoj kot najboljši »sidekick« vseh časov.”

BAUHINIA RHAPSODY je multikulturni roman, ki pripoveduje zgodbo o TATIE, osemnajstletni sanjačici, ki hrepeni po junaški Kitajski, kakršna obstaja v filmih, vendar ko prispe v Hong Kong na študentsko izmenjavo z namenom, da najde navdih za svoj pustolovski scenarij, spozna, da svet ni takšen, kot je prikazan na televiziji.

Kmalu ji začne dvoriti WALT, ambiciozen študent politologije iz vplivne teksaške družine, ki že kuje velike načrte za osvojitev Bele Hiše. Po dveh ponesrečenih zmenkih najde uteho in brata, ki si ga je vedno želela, v živahnem popotniku CHARLIEju. Kot upokojen bojevnik borilnih veščin ji ponudi pomoč pri pisanju akcijskih prizorov in jo spodbudi, naj sledi svojemu srcu.

Vendar največji izziv za Tatie postane vse tesnejše razmerje med Waltom in VIVIAN iz Washingtona, ki je obsedena pridobiti južnjakovo pozornost in se—na Tatiejino žalost—že oblači in obnaša kot bodoča državna sekretarka ZDA. Že tako imata veliko skupnega in sedaj letita v Peking isti konec tedna, kar je nedopustno. Tatie je odločena, da se ne bo vdala in gre za njima, a ni sama: RUBY WU je njena najbližja prijateljica, neprecenljiva v vlogi vodnice, prevajalke in tolažnice. Skupaj se odpravita na pustolovščino, da izsledita Walta in Vivian, ne vedoč, da ju čaka najhladnejši in najbolj megleni vikend v zgodovini potovanj.

REWARDS FOR BACKERS

“Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.” - Vincent Van Gogh

You can contribute either as an individual or organization. Every contribution is welcome and will be rewarded:

$10 – eBook

$25 – Signed book

$50 –Your name in the SPECIAL THANKS section in both eBook and hard copy

$100 – Your name in the DISTINGUISHED SPONSORS section in both eBook and hard copy, on my official author website www.janinecoel.com/distinguished-sponsors and other social media platforms; a Skype chat and my lifelong friendship

$500 – Create or personalize a character in my second book »Bauhinia Rhapsody 2: Adventures in the Wild West«

Nagrade za vaš prispevek

Zrno na zrno pogača, kamen na kamen palača. Prispevate lahko kot posameznik ali organizacija. Vsak vaš prispevek je dobrodošel in bo nagrajen v sledečih oblikah:

$10 – E-knjiga

$25 – Podpisana knjiga

$50 – Vaše ime v sekciji SPECIAL THANKS v e-knjigi in natisnjenem izvodu

$100 – Vaše ime v sekciji DISTINGUISHED SPONSORS v e-knjigi, natisnjenem izvodu ter na moji spletni strani www.janinecoel.com/distinguished-sponsors in drugih internetnih družbenih omrežjih z možnostjo rednega oglaševanja

$500 – Ustvarite ali personalizirajte lik v mojem drugem romanu »Bauhinia Rhapsody 2: Adventures in the Wild West«

Why $2200? 

The price of the novel editing package I've chosen is three cents per word. For a manuscript of 88,000 words, the price is just above $2600. The book cover design alone will cost me $150. The pledge of $2200 won’t cover all costs of self-publishing, and the rest will be covered with personal funds. 

Zakaj $2200?

Cena paketa profesionalnega lektoriranja »Novel Editing Package«, ki ga ponuja izbrana ameriška lektorica, je tri cente na besedo. Za rokopis, ki šteje 88,000 besed, je okvirna cena $2600. Stroški oblikovanja naslovnice so $150. Cilj kampanje je zbrati $2200, kar ne bo v celoti pokrilo vseh stroškov samozaložbe in preostalo bom pokrila z lastnimi sredstvi. 

Risks and challenges

Quoting Sylvester Stallone: “Grab life by the throat and do not let go until you succeed!” I didn’t go into this project asking for money for something that may never exist. The novel is 100% written and its estimated publishing date is August 2018. 

There is a risk that the book will need rewriting and extra time to incorporate edits, but, in any case, I’m looking forward to it and will keep you informed of the progress as well as delivery dates. Accordingly, I will publish posts and share updates regarding the campaign on my website www.janinecoel.com/crowdfunding-campaign and other social media platforms. 

If you have any concerns or questions about the project, please feel free to contact me through my website www.janinecoel.com or directly janinecoel@gmail.com
story_txt: Become part of »Bauhinia Rhapsody« and help me publish my debut novelPostanite del letošnjega koktajla potovalnih avantur in mi pomagajte izdati moj knjižni prvenecI’m Janine Coel (www.janinecoel.com), and I've written »Bauhinia Rhapsody: Adventures in Hong Kong«, a multicultural novel packed with travel discoveries, which brings readers inside one of Asia’s top destinations. I’ve worked on this project for two years, and now I’m proud to take the next step. Sem Slovenka, v literarnem svetu predstavljena kot Janine Coel, in sem pravkar napisala »Bauhinia Rhapsody: Adventures in Hong Kong«, roman, ki popelje bralca v eno izmed najbolj privlačnih destinacij v Aziji. Zgodba govori o Slovenki na Kitajskem in je polna potovalnih avantur, novih spoznanj in spodletelih romantičnih trikov. Official Teaser Trailer ‘‘Hong Kong is about to welcome the quirkiest bunch in the history of student exchange programs: Walt is obsessed with becoming the President of the United States, Tatie with winning an Oscar for best original screenplay, Vivian with moving into the White House alongside Walt, while Ruby, once again, confirms her existence as the greatest sidekick that ever lived." BAUHINIA RHAPSODY is a multicultural novel and tells the story of Tatie, an eighteen-year-old dreamer girl who yearns for the martial hero China as seen in the movies, but when she comes to Hong Kong for her studies and to find inspiration for the martial arts play she is writing, she realizes that the world is not as it is shown on television. She is soon courted by WALT, an ambitious Texan from an influential family, who already has big plans to conquer the White House. After two disastrous dates, she finds comfort and the brother she should’ve had but never did in CHARLIE, a vivacious backpacker. Being a retired martial artist himself, he offers to write the fight scenes for her play and inspires her to follow her heart, not her pension. However, she discovers a stronger-than-expected relationship between Walt and VIVIAN who is obsessed with gaining the Southerner's attention and—to Tatie's misfortune—already behaves and dresses as if she were the next Secretary of State. The two seem to have everything in common, and they are flying to Beijing the same weekend, which is unacceptable. Tatie is not alone: RUBY WU is her closest friend, invaluable in her role as guide, interpreter, and consoler, and together they set off on an adventure to track down Walt and Vivian. On the coldest and foggiest weekend in the history of sightseeing.You are welcome to contact me through my website www.janinecoel.com or directly janinecoel@gmail.com if you have any questions regarding the project. Če imate kakršnokoli vprašanje v zvezi s knjigo, kampanjo ali projektom nasploh, ste dobrodošli, da me kontaktirajte preko spletne strani ali janinecoel@gmail.comPripeljimo Slovenijo skupaj do večje prepoznavnosti Slovenski atributi in teme, ki sem jih vključila v roman:- glavna junakinja Tatjana oz.
