story:
ABOUT THIS PROJECT

The Easiest Way to Learn and Teach English/Spanish is a bilingual book with the beginning and intermediate level course created especially for people whose first language is English or Spanish. That book has been designed to help both English/Spanish speakers to speak effectively the language or even help the others who would like to learn.

Over 18 years I have used my own textbook, and methods teaching English/Spanish in different schools and universities to  Foreigners and national Mexican students. This textbook has become a great success. I would like to give the books to orphan children by helping them to learn English or Spanish, I need to raise $7,700 dollars to get the recording book lessons done.We are willing to give out English and Spanish lessons at a huge discount. At my partners website www.LearnEnglish.mx

Risks and challenges

This book has already been printed and published on www.amazon.com  and www.westbowpress.com  for sale. The risks and challenges that remain are not having enough financial resources to pay professionals to finish recording the step by step.These Audio lessons will help orphan children and others who needed to speak correctly with the proper pronunciation. Recording, producing the digital CDs, packaging and shipping the books on time are other challenges. However, I will use Indiegogo

funding to ensure this project gets done in a timely fashion.

ABOUT ME

MACKENZY JOSEPH

PROFESSOR / WRITER / INVENTOR & GLOBAL INNOVATIONS SERVICES INC FOUNDER

BIOGRAPHY

Having experiences working at private and public universities in Mexico (UREI,TEC DE MATEHUALA S,L,TEC DE DELICIAS CHIHUAHUA), for the last past 18 years, Mr. Mackenzy Joseph has held the position of an English Teacher. On February 25th, 2005 he has found a few methods through his own technique that could make learning English easier, thus he became the author of the English book titled ¨The Easiest Way to Learn and Teach English/Spanish¨. Facing the need to help those interesting in learning French, and using his own textbook in younger classrooms he came up with the idea of writing a French book on march 6th,2009 titled ¨La Meilleure Façon D´apprendre  et  D´enseigner  Le Français¨, wanted profusely to own an international company, he started to search for a non-compete product in the marketplace that could help families in their savings, thus show up the idea of Multi-belt, an invention  which will serve as four belts in one and which will help people in the combination of their dress code. From that idea came up the creation of his company named Global Innovations Services incorporated on March 15th, 2012 in New York. After a positive publication result of his invention, he acquired the permit to patent the idea in different countries to launch it to the Market under the rule section of the Worldwide Intellectual Property (WIPO). In 2013 he went through a financial hardship which stopped him moving forward with his projects. Through innovations and hard work; he has always motivated himself and those around him to do their best. he has been a creative Teacher and an excellent role model dedicated to his work, family, and friends maintaining a high standard for  himself as well as those he worked with, he has always provided the necessary support to help his students succeed as well try to make a change in the world through his belt innovative idea and his books.

WIPO online publication number: WO 2011/155813 A1

English Book copyright number, United States of America TXu 2-007-380

French Book copyright number, México D.F March 6th,2009: 03-2009-021711551700-01

https://m.facebook.com/4WAYBELT

https://www.facebook.com/joseph.mck.370

https://m.facebook.com/4WAYBELT

story:
We made our goal of reaching $100!

This is wonderful! I appreciate this so much!  It may not sound like a lofty goal, but it will help me in getting this novel to market. Thank you all!

 

Christmas is almost here and so is the end of this campaign. Let's celibrate!

Christmas is a time for me to give. I want to make my novel available to you. I have dropped the e-book prices until the end of this campaign. Check it out!

 

 

New book overview

(Let me know what one you like and you could win an e-book!)

Trillionaire and reformed celebrity bon vivant Rolland Newcastle is having a very bad night. Even with his shape-changing outfit and facial reconstructor, someone is stalking him. His nighttime stroll in the megacity of Heavensport is about to strip him of access to his vast wealth, connections, electronics, and friends. Who can you trust when those seeking your life are willing to use a missile? In a megacity, that could mean the death of millions of people.

This could be another start of a purge of the true owners of the blue gem of a planet called New Jerusalem. The first attempt happened infamously with The Fall of Heaven.

 

The Fall of Heaven - Overview

Heavensport

The exquisite blue gem planet of New Jerusalem is a dream. As one of the 780 million inhabitants of the megacity of Heavensport, there is always something to do. Day or night, mere minutes from your home you can be sailing, hypergliding, rock climbing, eating at five-star restaurants or enjoying yourself at one of the thousands of shopping and fun zones around the city. As always, there is no pressure to do anything. There are enough resources and robots for every need so that no one has to work.

One of its famous citizens, Rolland Newcastle appears to have everything going for him. Now he has something else that is definitely going for him, and it wants him dead – and the media couldn’t be more delighted.

Rolland’s trouble is one that he inherited from his ancestors, the legal owners of the beautiful and extremely wealthy planet of New Jerusalem. After cryrosleeping for 223 years, they found that technological advances had allowed squatters to arrive in just 3.5 years. Arriving 200 years too late, they found an already established world that didn’t want them. The Fall of Heaven was just the start.

To read Excerpts from the first chapter please visit www.fallofheaven.com

 

 

My name is David Grunwell, I am a husband and a father of a nine-year-old daughter. I am a creative director and a futurist. My dream since my youth is to be an author.

My dream is close. I have spent five years writing and rewriting my science fiction, adventure, and suspense novel The Fall of Heaven. I have put everything my family has towards this goal. So I am turning to you.

This book is ready.  In all endeavors, there is a point of balance between seeking its personal form of perfection and overproducing to where it loses its life and vitality.

You have the power to launch this book.

 

 

Genres

Science Fiction, Suspense, Action/Adventure, Christian, Thriller, Mystery, Colonization, Utopian

 

 

 

My financial goal is to raise at least $990 to finish the editing of this novel.

Money raised beyond this goal will be put toward editing services, copyright filings, business development, incorporation, new domain names, marketing, and other costs for producing my other novels like my fantasy series Trolls and Other Trouble.

 

 

 

Levels of support and the perks!

$4 - Save 50%! Normally $8 you will receive the advance e-book version of The Fall of Heaven in its current pre-release form before the final edits are completed. Warts and all! (Warts, how’s that for great marketing?) It is in very good shape, though it may be missing a few commas.

$5 – This is the normally $12 perk. Save $7 or 58%! Receive the advance e-book version of The Fall of Heaven in its current form before the final edits and the final edited version of the ebook. 

$25 – Will receive the e-books (pre-release and final) and a trade paperback (larger format) when it is released.

$40 – Will receive the e-books (pre-release and final) and a signed trade paperback copy when it is released.

$75 – Will receive the e-books (pre-release and final), a signed trade paperback copy when it is released and your name immortalized as a sponsor in the ebook releases.

$100 and above – Will receive the e-books (pre-release and final), a signed trade paperback copy when it is released, and your name immortalized as a sponsor/patron in the ebook and first printed book release. A limited edition mug emblazoned with The Fall of Heaven. Who doesn’t like to curl up with a cup of coffee or tea and read a good book? *Your name could be used in the story for “the prestigious Gromeleski-Musk Scientific Excellence Award.” We can discuss other options for your inclusion in the novel.

$250 and above – Will receive the e-books (pre-release and final), two signed paperback copies when it is released, and your name immortalized as the top sponsor/patron in the ebook and the first release of the printed book. A matching set of limited edition mugs emblazoned with The Fall of Heaven. A phone call with the author about the books, technology, writing, or pretty much anything that interests you. *Some naming of ancillary characters or cities may be available.

*The name used cannot be used to promote a politician, belief or political system, to slander, embarrass, or harass. It must have the written consent of the person to be named.

 

 

 

If I do not make this full goal 

I will use the campaign funds that are raised for editing and I will send out the pre-release e-books and gifts like the mugs. The trade paperbacks will be on hold until I am able to finalize the editing for publishing.

 

 

 

The impact of your gift

I have sought to make this book fun and thoughtful, not just another rehash of some previous novel. It takes on the issues of change, loss, redemption, forgiveness, and human behavior.

With over twenty years as a creative director, working in media design, and business, I have the experience to build and market projects. This has been a great adventure, but I need your help to make it happen.

 

 

 

Development Plan

I have used these skills to create:

  • A business plan
  • Graphics
  • Marketing
  • Websites  - www.fallofheaven.com  www.dgrunwell.com to see some book cover designs
  • Social media  www.facebook.com/dsgrunwell/  twitter.com/DavidGrunwell
  • Videos for campaigns
  • Book covers (at least four different styles)

 

 

Phase One with full funding:

  • Crowdfunding campaign ending mid to late December 2017
  • Pre-release e-book to backers - December 2017
  • Build email list and social media interest - December 2017
  • Final editing finished by end of January 2018
  • Advance copies to local media and national professional reviewers - February 2018
  • Public e-book and trade paperback editions release through Amazon - end of February 2018.
  • The goal of having 100 reviews to be published by the crowdsourcing backers and beta readers to coincide with the Amazon release to bring The Fall of Heaven up in the search results to build interest and readership.

Phase Two:

Publishing through IngramSparks to make this novel available to bookstores and libraries around the world.

 

 

Your help will make this book a reality.

 

 

 

Risks and Challenges

There is always the risk that this funding campaign does not work, then the final release will take longer than shown in the phase plan. I am committed to publishing this novel and my fantasy series Trolls and Other Trouble which is ready for final editing.

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Trust me, I know that times are tight. There are ways that you can help even when money is not an option.

  • Let others that you know that they can be part of bringing a new, yet undiscovered author and his work to the world through this campaign. Let your friends and family know. If I didn’t believe in this book, I wouldn’t ask.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to let others know!

 

Thank You and Merry Christmas!

We made our goal of reaching $100!This is wonderful! I appreciate this so much!  It may not sound like a lofty goal, but it will help me in getting this novel to market. Thank you all! Christmas is almost here and so is the end of this campaign. Let's celibrate!Christmas is a time for me to give. I want to make my novel available to you. I have dropped the e-book prices until the end of this campaign. Check it out!  New book overview(Let me know what one you like and you could win an e-book!)Trillionaire and reformed celebrity bon vivant Rolland Newcastle is having a very bad night. Even with his shape-changing outfit and facial reconstructor, someone is stalking him. His nighttime stroll in the megacity of Heavensport is about to strip him of access to his vast wealth, connections, electronics, and friends. Who can you trust when those seeking your life are willing to use a missile? In a megacity, that could mean the death of millions of people.This could be another start of a purge of the true owners of the blue gem of a planet called New Jerusalem. The first attempt happened infamously with The Fall of Heaven. The Fall of Heaven - OverviewHeavensportThe exquisite blue gem planet of New Jerusalem is a dream. As one of the 780 million inhabitants of the megacity of Heavensport, there is always something to do. Day or night, mere minutes from your home you can be sailing, hypergliding, rock climbing, eating at five-star restaurants or enjoying yourself at one of the thousands of shopping and fun zones around the city. As always, there is no pressure to do anything. There are enough resources and robots for every need so that no one has to work.One of its famous citizens, Rolland Newcastle appears to have everything going for him. Now he has something else that is definitely going for him, and it wants him dead – and the media couldn’t be more delighted.Rolland’s trouble is one that he inherited from his ancestors, the legal owners of the beautiful and extremely wealthy planet of New Jerusalem. After cryrosleeping for 223 years, they found that technological advances had allowed squatters to arrive in just 3.5 years. Arriving 200 years too late, they found an already established world that didn’t want them. The Fall of Heaven was just the start.To read Excerpts from the first chapter please visit www.fallofheaven.com  My name is David Grunwell, I am a husband and a father of a nine-year-old daughter. I am a creative director and a futurist. My dream since my youth is to be an author.My dream is close. I have spent five years writing and rewriting my science fiction, adventure, and suspense novel The Fall of Heaven. I have put everything my family has towards this goal. So I am turning to you.This book is ready.  In all endeavors, there is a point of balance between seeking its personal form of perfection and overproducing to where it loses its life and vitality.You have the power to launch this book.  GenresScience Fiction, Suspense, Action/Adventure, Christian, Thriller, Mystery, Colonization, Utopian   My financial goal is to raise at least $990 to finish the editing of this novel.Money raised beyond this goal will be put toward editing services, copyright filings, business development, incorporation, new domain names, marketing, and other costs for producing my other novels like my fantasy series Trolls and Other Trouble.   Levels of support and the perks!$4 - Save 50%! Normally $8 you will receive the advance e-book version of The Fall of Heaven in its current pre-release form before the final edits are completed. Warts and all! (Warts, how’s that for great marketing?) It is in very good shape, though it may be missing a few commas.$5 – This is the normally $12 perk. Save $7 or 58%! Receive the advance e-book version of The Fall of Heaven in its current form before the final edits and the final edited version of the ebook. $25 – Will receive the e-books (pre-release and final) and a trade paperback (larger format) when it is released.$40 – Will receive the e-books (pre-release and final) and a signed trade paperback copy when it is released.$75 – Will receive the e-books (pre-release and final), a signed trade paperback copy when it is released and your name immortalized as a sponsor in the ebook releases.$100 and above – Will receive the e-books (pre-release and final), a signed trade paperback copy when it is released, and your name immortalized as a sponsor/patron in the ebook and first printed book release. A limited edition mug emblazoned with The Fall of Heaven. Who doesn’t like to curl up with a cup of coffee or tea and read a good book? *Your name could be used in the story for “the prestigious Gromeleski-Musk Scientific Excellence Award.” We can discuss other options for your inclusion in the novel.$250 and above – Will receive the e-books (pre-release and final), two signed paperback copies when it is released, and your name immortalized as the top sponsor/patron in the ebook and the first release of the printed book. A matching set of limited edition mugs emblazoned with The Fall of Heaven. A phone call with the author about the books, technology, writing, or pretty much anything that interests you. *Some naming of ancillary characters or cities may be available.*The name used cannot be used to promote a politician, belief or political system, to slander, embarrass, or harass. It must have the written consent of the person to be named.   If I do not make this full goal I will use the campaign funds that are raised for editing and I will send out the pre-release e-books and gifts like the mugs. The trade paperbacks will be on hold until I am able to finalize the editing for publishing.   The impact of your giftI have sought to make this book fun and thoughtful, not just another rehash of some previous novel. It takes on the issues of change, loss, redemption, forgiveness, and human behavior.With over twenty years as a creative director, working in media design, and business, I have the experience to build and market projects. This has been a great adventure, but I need your help to make it happen.   Development PlanI have used these skills to create:
